comments: I love this puzzle game to death. I can literally play it all day and never get tired. Thank you for the challenging ones, it gets my brain going and it makes the game more tense. I certainly am inlove with the music. Please put a soundtrack on youtube, I would love to listen to it !! Thank you creators of the game, I enjoy playing it so much, and I do hope that there's more.

I like it! Certain levels were so challenging to beat in Expert Mode I thought it was impossible. But with some patience you can solve it! (With the exception of Houston U-4 how do you beat that in 46 moves lol)
I don,t have the words to say about the game but only one problem of this game ads always on. The top of the screen

This game has alot of benefits, especially, the decision making, plan ahead, multi tasking, pattern recognition and many more. Thank to this game, its very addictive, plain and simple, make you relax and it doesnt stress. Deserve to be 5 star.
Cool I like the complexity of it, it isn't always too easy. But I would like a 'reset' option so I don't have to drag the arrows back every time I go wrong
The controls can sometimes be a little weird, but other then that everything is perfect. It's just a really good game in general. The animation is so adorable.

descriptionHTML:
RGB Express is a unique and beautiful puzzle game. Simple to play, yet super addictive!

You are running RGB Express, the one and only delivery company specialized in delivering colors.


This is how you do it:

🤔 Draw routes for your truck drivers
🎁 Make sure that every house receives the correct package
▶️ Press play
🚚💨 Sit back and watch while RGB Express delivers!


Features:

✓ 400 FREE levels
✓ Easy gameplay suitable for all ages
✓ Lots of challenges for puzzle game fans
✓ Beautiful graphics
✓ Excellent soundtrack and hilarious sound effects

The game starts off with easy puzzles, which will teach you the many tricks, that help you solve the more difficult ones. There are bridges, buttons, sometimes you must swap cargo from one truck to another.. Eventually you will meet the mysterious white car!


★★ Pocket Gamer GOLD AWARD winner! ★★
★★ Already 7 million players! Thank you all! ★★


Available In-App purchases:

PREMIUM 💎 KING TRUCK 👑
★ The premium version of RGB Express
★ Removes ads
★ Supports game development and future updates

HINTS 🤯
★ The game contains 3 free hints that will help you if you get stuck. If you want to use more hints, you can buy them as in-app purchases.


Please note:
★ Watching bonus videos after completing levels is optional. Press the arrow button to proceed to next level if you don't wish to watch a video
★ TIP: Sign-in to Google Play Games at the main menu to unlock achievements! If you change your phone or tablet, you can then restore your game progress by signing in to Google Play Games before completing any levels. Please note that this only restores the progress based on the achievements (100% completed islands).
recentChanges: - A new challenge: Mirror mode! Another perspective to solve the puzzles  [Complete 100 levels to unlock mirror mode]
- Expert Mode par values are now tougher on some levels!  [Complete 200 levels to unlock Expert Mode]
- Improved tutorials to help new players
summary: Easy to learn puzzle game with a serious challenge for puzzle game fans!
title: RGB Express

comments: I love this, the achievements and different types of characters are great, the only the that sucked for me was the music. I wish there was at least more variety because the song that plays throughout the menu and game isn't that good + it gets old.

descriptionHTML:
Dash headlong into an astonishingly fun (and incredibly cute) 3D endless-run adventure! Take on level after level as you fly your cuddly Fluffy through danger with just a finger. Dodge a blaze, snake around ice, go rolling past lasers and escape other crazy hazards that block your way.

The road is full of pitfalls, but it’s sure to pull you in.

Features:
• Amazing 3D animation meets accessible gameplay that’s popular with kids, but still has enough fast arcade action to give anyone a rush.
• Dodge screen-blurring ice blocks, escape flames and blaze past loads of other dangers that can harm your adorable Fluffy.
• Collect Gold to unlock more than 60 cool Fluffies and find the cute little puff that suits you the best.

The perfect game for rolling out to kids (yet still super addicting to adults) who enjoy the popular endless-run gameplay style and fast action!

comments: Great game! I really love it and its great to play when you want to pass through time. My only issue i have is that my upgrades are so high that i go over the side barrier almost every time. I feel it would be awsome if, like bats, you could unlock new balls. Also, online leaderboards would be awesome, so we can see who holds the current record.

One thing is bombarding everyone with ads, another is: 1. There is no sound whatsoever. 2. The whole purpose of the game is getting a new bat.  3. There is no point of hitting it down the middle because it will hit something and bounce back thousands of feet.  Overall this game sucks! About the ads?  I've learned 1 thing: If you see a game on an ad? When you download that game, it will be flooded with ads. That's just how that works...

The game is awesome but there are way to many ads between pitches. Cmon man!! I get it u want to make money.. So how much does it cost to have an ad free Baseball Boy? I feel like 99 cents would reasonable. Cause everyone would buy it just to not be annoyed by the stupid ads!! üòò

Bloody adds. Relax with the adds. There way way way way way way way you too many adds. Every time you play you gotta wait for an add to finish. It's disgusting. Whats the world coming too. Rather pay a dollar and have no adds. You guys messed up big time by making this an add flogging game. Hang your self's from a tree by your throat. Hope you get cancer.

The makers of this game deserve to be robbed of their anal virginity by Satan himself. Why should I be spending nearly twice as much time watching ads as I am playing the game? This is an ad revenue app, not a game. This does not deserve to be called a game. To get around watching ads, close the app and restart it. You'll skip the ad, but you'll still be spending more time reloading the game than actually playing it. To whomever made this game, I hope your kids become drug addicts and you die alone

Great game there are ads but I would rather have ads to get double coins some people get pissed off with ads how do you except developers to improve the games with out ads cause other companies pay them to have them. So overall it's great game good time killer and easy to play

comments: My game is literally unplayable right now. For about a week now, it has randomly just lagged out and would take 5 seconds for every action to actually take place. Now, when i boot up the game, it just freezes when i click on anything. My shop tries to open but just goes to a black screen and freezes. I will try to play for a few more days, but if i cant play by the end of the weekend, i will be deleting the game.

What is wrong with the newest update? I can't acquire my item from the switch shop. Every time I click on get item, the black screen goes to the top left of the screen. And I can see the normal background picture. When that happens I have to close the game and reset. I've tried to get the item 20 times and it does that every time.

Was a great game til the update. Now I have to open it twice for my energy to update and for the money in the pawn shop to change. Also when I bargain with clients now it's alway a negative profit compared to before. More annoying then anything

It's a fun game my only complaints are that you have to wait until your energy refills. There is no way to earn energy and you should make it so you can customize and/or upgrade your shop. Make it more exciting. Also you open the building that say they will finish construction soon because the game gets boring if there no excitement added to it.

I enjoy playing this game. Currently I have two major problems with it.  1. I wish I could change orientation based on how my phone is tilted.  2. I tried to have Mutt trade something really expensive and now it freezes every time I attempt to open the trade.

Cool. Fun. But your guys really need to fix the bugs. I would load it and keep it open doing certain things (playing a auction getting a item appraised and it would FREEZE or take absolutely forever. I would have to close the game out and re load it.
description: Bidding on storage auctions is a very good way to make money, if you‚Äôre not afraid to test your luck and instincts, that is. Go full high-stakes, outbid your rivals and turn a profit by selling your valuable acquisitions in your own pawn shop. You‚Äôll be rich and powerful in no time!HIGHLIGHTSüí∏PROFIT from your smart deals and unlock new buildings in town to expand your business and make even more money!üí∏OUTBID your competition in edge-of-your-seat storage auctions. Enjoy intense gameplay as you choose, analyze and bid faster than your rivals in auctions all over the world!üí∏RUN your own pawn shop and display your rare and valuable acquisitions. Make customers come from all over the world to spend money on your business and make you rich!üí∏LIVE through a gripping story with engaging characters on your quest to turn your rundown family business into a city-wide business empire!üí∏GET KNOWN in the auction world and be noticed by big names on the scene: you never know who might want to do business with you!üí∏COLLECT a wide range of exotic items, from rare antiques you can restore to cars and boats you can renovate and sell at an epic profit!Take part in every auction and don‚Äôt miss a single opportunity to bid: some of these musty old garages hide treasures beyond your wildest dreams! Try your luck, but never ignore your instincts: they can make or break a bidder‚Äôs career!Become a rising star as you take part in bigger auctions and deal with the good and bad attention you‚Äôll get: some big pawn shop moguls might not like the competition your business represents, and they‚Äôll pull out all the stops to hinder your path! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
descriptionHTML:
Bidding on storage auctions is a very good way to make money, if you’re not afraid to test your luck and instincts, that is. Go full high-stakes, outbid your rivals and turn a profit by selling your valuable acquisitions in your own pawn shop. You’ll be rich and powerful in no time!

HIGHLIGHTS

💸PROFIT from your smart deals and unlock new buildings in town to expand your business and make even more money!

💸OUTBID your competition in edge-of-your-seat storage auctions. Enjoy intense gameplay as you choose, analyze and bid faster than your rivals in auctions all over the world!

💸RUN your own pawn shop and display your rare and valuable acquisitions. Make customers come from all over the world to spend money on your business and make you rich!

💸LIVE through a gripping story with engaging characters on your quest to turn your rundown family business into a city-wide business empire!

💸GET KNOWN in the auction world and be noticed by big names on the scene: you never know who might want to do business with you!

💸COLLECT a wide range of exotic items, from rare antiques you can restore to cars and boats you can renovate and sell at an epic profit!

Take part in every auction and don’t miss a single opportunity to bid: some of these musty old garages hide treasures beyond your wildest dreams! Try your luck, but never ignore your instincts: they can make or break a bidder’s career!

Become a rising star as you take part in bigger auctions and deal with the good and bad attention you’ll get: some big pawn shop moguls might not like the competition your business represents, and they’ll pull out all the stops to hinder your path! Such problems come with the territory when you get rich and notorious, so be prepared to deal with it!

Start your pawn empire now and get ready to bid!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

Otherwise great game.

description: Upgrade your cars, enable new skills, use your own drafts to create new parts, apply them on your cars, and win rivals!STYLINGStyling features allow you to change the look and feel of your car, from headlights to body kits. A wide selection of color and coloring types.DRIVER'S SKILLSUpgrade your driver's level by learning new skills. There are dozens of new abilities and it's up to you to decide what your build is going to be like.TUNINGYou are sure to love our non-linear car upgrade model. Hundreds of spare parts are waiting for your tweaks in the game. Don't have the right one? descriptionHTML:

descriptionHTML:
Help rookie detective Parker solve cases and bring criminals to justice!

In Parker & Lane – Criminal Justice, a streak of murders plagues the city. Become a homicide detective and restore law and order in this unique crime investigation game!

Lily Parker is a smart and righteous detective who works hard to put criminals behind bars and make the world a better place, even if her own life is a mess. Victor Lane is a smug but charming criminal defense attorney who doesn’t care who he’s defending as long as he’s getting paid. He’s also the best at his job.

When some of the criminals Lane defended in the past start dying, Parker’s forced to work with him to find the culprit. Could it be one of the criminal’s victims? Or perhaps some kind of vigilante? Is Lane himself being targeted?

Immerse yourself in the first episode of an exciting time management story game, feel the thrill of the chase and prove that your detective skills are second to none! Parker & Lane – Criminal Justice is waiting for you.

🕵️‍♀️ Help expose the hidden killer before another victim falls!
🔎 Look for evidence while investigating 9 different locations
🕵️‍♀️ Master 18 mini games based on forensic investigation
🔎 Examine clues and analyze objects using forensic techniques
🕵️‍♀️ Play through 60 extraordinary story levels and 30 extra challenge levels
🔎 Complete your case file by collecting diamonds
🕵️‍♀️ Conquer daily challenges to earn extra diamonds for your case file
🔎 Beat your high score with a choice of 15 awesome endless levels

Try the first few levels for free! To access the full game, you can either unlock everything with an in-app purchase, or continue playing the free version with ads.

Follow Parker & Lane on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GameHouseOriginalStories/

Download the GameHouse Original Stories app and enjoy other amazing games like Delicious, Heart's Medicine and Fabulous: https://goo.gl/SXb8sa

comments: I first got this game because it seemed interesting and whatnot, but I then completed the tutorial and went on to race other people but when I pressed the race button, I lost 20 energy but I didn't go on to race anyone or do anything else really. I then pressed to race button again and again and nothing happened other than me losing all of my energy. I don't know why this happened but I'd like compensation, thank you.

Was a great game but is all messed up now.  Freezing, dropping, can barely even get races to start.  Don't know what happened but it needs to be fixed back to the way it used to be. If fixed would be all 5 stars.

I'm fed up of this game taking away my energy but not even putting me in a race! And I don't even get reimbursed for it! It connects and puts me in a race sometimes but nobody is there.... or sometimes it just glitches before putting me in to the race.......... sort it out. I'm deleting this bull.
Few glitches where it takes fuel, then never starts a race search.   But it isn't bad if I've played every day since I downloaded it.  34 consecutive days so far!

Hard to rate higher than one when it's so bugged that you can't actually race. Fix the bugs so it becomes playable again. New update just made it worse. Real shame as this is a cool game when it works.

It's a cool name. I'd like it if I could play it. But I run out of energy afternoon racing once. It goes it and either doesn't find opponents or it does then freezes and it wasted all my energy every time. Thumbs down

Your favorite characters in a brand new adventure;
In this new world, you are our only hope!

● After 14 years, Seal Online From Korea is Back!

comments: Great game! Simplistic in the greatest form from graphics to game play. Would be 5 stars but -1 for placement of bottom ad I mean so easy to accidentally hit. Well placed I'm sure....With recent update I think you get random ad runs too. Game 5+ stars. 4 because of ads..

Smooth control. Awesome idea . Not Much more I can say about it.(First Review). Now, my first thoughts about this game was that it was very good but as I have updated the game it has just been very slow and overturns when you tap. It also randomly takes you to the play store without tapping on an ad.

Very enjoyable game, quite addictive and jumping back into a new game is quick. Couple of gripes, there seems to be some slow down or framrate dipping after an ad has shown and the option to remove ads isn't working. Sort this out and it will get another 2 stars
Ads pop up during gameplay where your fingers contact so it stops game play ... other than that it's good but I've had enough. Fk you chilly:-p uninstalling

The game was awesome and I loved it. But the latest update ruined it with ADS. They put the banner exactly where you mostly tap with the fingers to change direction, the game got laggy which it was not before and has started getting way too many pop ups. Uninstalling. *Sigh*

A lot of frame rate issues. Lost many runs because controls become unresponsive while gameplay continued. Ads are incredible intrusive. That said, it can be really fun if they cleaned up the coding on this simple game.

descriptionHTML:
Your friends – fluffy kitten Kiki and adorable puppy Fifi – are inviting you to their new adventures at Royal Pet Hotel. Have fun while exploring the hotel and taking care of your virtual animal guests!

There is no time to be bored! Decorate Pet Hotel and design the most amazing reception desk. Help puppy Fifi to check-in and find her room. Unpack Fifi’s clothes, shoes and accessories, and style her bag. Don’t forget to feed Fifi when she is hungry! You can find her favorite dishes at the Hotel Café: pizza, doughnuts and juice cocktails!

Play pet style makeover in Kiki’s room, and create the perfect hair and makeup look. Take care of baby tiger Lili while she is taking a bath. Shop for stylish clothes and accessories for all animal friends, and feel free to ask cute fluffy hotel staff for help!

Kiki & Fifi Pet Hotel fun little games for kids:
· Style and decorate Reception to your own taste!
· Help little puppy Fifi to check-in and find her room!
· Unpack Fifi’s clothes and design her travel bag!
· Dry and comb Kiki’s beautiful hair and do her makeup!
· Help tiger Cara to take care of her baby Lili: bath her and style her hair!
· Feed Fifi yummy lunch at the Café!
· Dress up Kiki, Fifi, Cara and Lili in the most amazing outfits at the Fashion Shop!
· Call Reception if you have troubles – cute bunnies are ready to help you!
· Play Kiki & Fifi Pet Hotel game every day and collect rewards!
· Watch videos and get extra coins for new game items!


- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

descriptionHTML:
Ready to take on the hottest role playing game out there and bend fire-breathing dragons to your will? Are you the one to claim the title of top Dragon Master in the world? Accept the challenge and prove your might!

Build a Dragon City on floating Islands and fill it with farms, habitats, buildings… and dragons! Collect and train your cute babies and evolve them into impressive beasts that will defend you in the PvP Arenas!

Join forces with other Dragon Masters in Alliances, interact in the chat and obtain rewards from the Alliance Chest.

Combine dragons of Fire, Nature, War, Legend and lots of other elements to hatch rare hybrids and expand your collection. You can also obtain dragons from exclusive events!

FEATURES

- Complete the Dragon Book! There are over 500 dragons to breed and collect.
- New dragons join the game every week through breeding events and special islands.
- Challenge yourself at the Dragon Quests and fight against other Masters in the PvP Arenas to collect exclusive dragons, claim Warrior’s Chests, and climb up the leaderboards!
- Summon dragons of the at the Tree Of Life and try their skills.
- Unlock advanced features like the Ancient World and the Guardian Dragons.
- Be social: Join Alliances to play with other masters, chat with them, and open Alliance Chests.
- Log in with Facebook to save your game and play on all your devices - That way you can take your baby dragons everywhere.

There are over 80 million Dragon Masters. What are you waiting for? Join the fun!

If you already love our dragons… Drop us a nice review :)

Dragon City is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.

Follow us on Twitter: @DragonCityGame
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DragonCity
Subscribe to our Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/DragonCityChannel

Check out other cool games by the creators of Dragon City: Monster Legends and World Chef!

comments: Very simple. Gives me a lot of nostalgia. Two things though, it seriously needs music maybe some Celtic tunes or shanties. And secondly it needs more stuff to do. When I first saw a whale I was excited about doing some whaling but nope. The whales do absolutely nothing. Maybe even some treasure hunting puzzles or something. Good game just needs a little more content.

Good game however, once you've taken control of all the islands there is little else to keep you interested. I would look at adding more world's and making the trading a real economy by having the ability to buy items and sell them for a profit in different ports. Potentially even have your ports taken over again or mutiny so you need to recapture them.

Overall the game is great. Gameplay is smooth but slow (hey, old ships), making the gameplay calming. Graphics are pleasing to the eyes, though it could still need improvements. Sounds are calming too.   You guys should change the image for the gold coins since it resembles a symbol in One Piece. And also the whale movement could be smoother and slower. You could add more creatures in the ocean in addition to the whale since its just blank at times.

It's a really great game! I'm really looking forward to an update. I think it'd be REALLY helpful to be able to purchase an extra boat that just goes around and picks up boxes.. Having to turn around all the time gets tedious. Also an online pvp would be awesome. Maybe have the ability to make clans with your friends that can attack other clans. I'm looking forward to see what you guys do!

This game is great overall and you have a great sense of progression as your ship gets bigger and faster. The problem is the controls themselves. I found it very hard( I noticed this when I reached HP or ship level 6 ) and sometimes close to impossible to fire at other ship even at point blank range. The game has a very hard time trying to focus on one ship and would often shoot at where the enemy was 3 seconds ago especially when there is more than 3 ships at once which often happens. I would recommend a fire button option to compliment the controls and the gameplay experience. As I said before, it is indeed a very amusing game and would be even more enjoyable with this added feature.

Great game in all honesty I can actually see myself playing this game for weeks to months. Everything about it is perfect and I  love how it is not based on a story.   Note devs: for some reason after playing for 10 min strait my boat gets to the point where it can't hit a single shot so I have to restart the game.

description: Remark: The game language itself is German, but most words are still in English, and most functionalities are easy to guess. There will be an ‚Äúall-English‚Äù update in the future, but feel free to race for your personal best time with this version already. #unraceable icebox - Create it, feel it!#unraceable #icebox turns you into a track designer in a playful way: You build your own track with your own hands directly at the #unraceable #table into a real snow slope - incl. Inclines, curves, archways, ski jumps, finishing line, blue slope markings and so on.The finished racing track will then be scanned and completed to a revolutionary 3D virtual reality landscape that you can drive in either in the #unraceable simulator, or at home via ‚ÄúAudi #unraceable‚Äù app. This is where the adventure starts: With the VR glasses, you experience the virtual car race on your personal route sitting on a Motion Seat in real time. Emotional, real, tangible: the Motion Seat transmits speed, braking- and physical forces up to 2G directly to the player in a perfect simulation. Check out the current location of the seat at www.unraceable.at.Take it, enjoy it, share it!The mobile app gives you the unique opportunity to take your individual racetrack back home with you on your smartphone, to experience it over and over again and to further improve your personal top performance. You can challenge your friends via Facebook on your track and rate the tracks of other friends. Your track will also be sent to you by E-mail including a photo of your performance in the Motion Seat.How are you able to share your track with friends? The image of your racetrack will include a code: If you enter this code in the app, your track will be publicly available for everyone to race on. When a friend shares his "skiing adventure", you will have the opportunity to accept the challenge and beat your friend's time with this track-code. Moreover: As a logged-in Facebook user you will be able to see the shared routes of your friends on an extra tab.The ultimate Special: Beat the stars!An absolute highlight are the star specials from #unraceable. For example, you will be able to challenge various stars on their tracks. The master track of the 6-time overall World Cup winner and Audi brand ambassador Marcel Hirscher is certainly the ultimate challenge. Hirscher's best time is the benchmark for all challengers and gives you the chance to get your personal bonus for your Audi. The faster you are mastering Marcel Hirscher's racetrack, the more bonus (up to 2,000 ‚Ç¨!) you will receive - applicable for a new Audi ‚ÄúJungwagen‚Äù. Simple as that. It is worth it, because there are only 100 bonuses available! Start against the World Cup winner as often as you like - but only your best time will count! But be careful: This bonus expires by the end of this year (2017).Your individual upgradeBeing a top performer pays off: #unraceable #icebox offers you the opportunity to earn "Audi Credits" on all racetracks. These credits are the currency that gives you unbeatable advantages when choosing a vehicle. This lets you for example upgrade your Audi A3 to an S3 and subsequently to an RS3 ‚Äì with each upgrade the vehicle is getting faster and thereby improves your performance while hunting for extra bonus points. Audi Credits can be collected with jumps, drifts and other furious driving maneuvers.
descriptionHTML:
Remark: The game language itself is German, but most words are still in English, and most functionalities are easy to guess. There will be an “all-English” update in the future, but feel free to race for your personal best time with this version already.

#unraceable icebox - Create it, feel it!

#unraceable #icebox turns you into a track designer in a playful way: You build your own track with your own hands directly at the #unraceable #table into a real snow slope - incl. Inclines, curves, archways, ski jumps, finishing line, blue slope markings and so on.
The finished racing track will then be scanned and completed to a revolutionary 3D virtual reality landscape that you can drive in either in the #unraceable simulator, or at home via “Audi #unraceable” app. This is where the adventure starts: With the VR glasses, you experience the virtual car race on your personal route sitting on a Motion Seat in real time. Emotional, real, tangible: the Motion Seat transmits speed, braking- and physical forces up to 2G directly to the player in a perfect simulation. Check out the current location of the seat at www.unraceable.at.
Take it, enjoy it, share it!

The mobile app gives you the unique opportunity to take your individual racetrack back home with you on your smartphone, to experience it over and over again and to further improve your personal top performance. You can challenge your friends via Facebook on your track and rate the tracks of other friends. Your track will also be sent to you by E-mail including a photo of your performance in the Motion Seat.
How are you able to share your track with friends? The image of your racetrack will include a code: If you enter this code in the app, your track will be publicly available for everyone to race on. When a friend shares his "skiing adventure", you will have the opportunity to accept the challenge and beat your friend's time with this track-code. Moreover: As a logged-in Facebook user you will be able to see the shared routes of your friends on an extra tab.

The ultimate Special: Beat the stars!

An absolute highlight are the star specials from #unraceable. For example, you will be able to challenge various stars on their tracks. The master track of the 6-time overall World Cup winner and Audi brand ambassador Marcel Hirscher is certainly the ultimate challenge. Hirscher's best time is the benchmark for all challengers and gives you the chance to get your personal bonus for your Audi. The faster you are mastering Marcel Hirscher's racetrack, the more bonus (up to 2,000 €!) you will receive - applicable for a new Audi “Jungwagen”. Simple as that. It is worth it, because there are only 100 bonuses available! Start against the World Cup winner as often as you like - but only your best time will count! But be careful: This bonus expires by the end of this year (2017).

Your individual upgrade

Being a top performer pays off: #unraceable #icebox offers you the opportunity to earn "Audi Credits" on all racetracks. These credits are the currency that gives you unbeatable advantages when choosing a vehicle. This lets you for example upgrade your Audi A3 to an S3 and subsequently to an RS3 – with each upgrade the vehicle is getting faster and thereby improves your performance while hunting for extra bonus points. Audi Credits can be collected with jumps, drifts and other furious driving maneuvers.

Porsche Austria GmbH & Co OG
A-5020 Salzburg | Louise-Pi√´ch-Stra√üe 2

title: Audi #unraceable: Top Racing Challenge

comments: Energy system/Timer. It's 2018 not 2005. Adverts to shorten timers. Game forces you to pay to advance via strength caps.   No auto-loot pick up. You have to walk on top of the items to grab em. Make the pet useful and have it pick up items.   Abysmal inventory management. No auto arrange. Selling items is per page instead of selling low tier items first.  Great graphics doesn't save it from being uninstalled.

descriptionHTML:
Help your people! Join the fight against the Skeleton Boss, and become the best hero in the dungeons.

Live a real adventure with this online Action MMORPG game. Enjoy Dungeon Legends for free, and discover an endless world of battles, quests, and epic creatures.

Dungeon Legends is a hack & slash game optimized for mobile devices. A classic ARPG experience adapted to touch screens.

Fight against other players in the pvp multiplayer modes like the Arena, and become a legend of the dungeons. Go over the dungeons looking for incredible adventures, and legendary treasures, or ask for help to overcome the quests of the online cooperative multiplayer mode. Join a clan and fight the most epic battles to conquer the dungeons.

Adapt your hero to your gameplay. Turn your Dwarf into an epic warrior, a healer, a hunter or a protector. Train your hero in the adventure quests, and fight other heroes in the online pvp multiplayer arena.

🐲 BUILD YOUR OWN ADVENTURE
It was a long time ago, but Dwarfs remember the Skeleton Boss. He attacked the villages with his army of goblins, skeletons, trolls, and balrogs. But Dwarfs do not surrender, they fear nothing, and they cooperated to hunt their enemies, and battle that army.
Dwarfs defeated the Skeleton Boss, and force him to hide in the ancient Dungeons.

Now, the Skeleton Boss is back.

He is summoning an army to leave his prison, and take revenge on the Dwarfs.
The Skeleton Boss is waiting in his throne, deep in the Dungeons.The only hope for the Dwarfs is to find him, cooperate, and hunt him before he recovers his power.

🔮DISCOVER AN ENDLESS ADVENTURE RPG GAME
Each quest in this Action RPG is unique. Unleash your arcane powers, and hack and slash the evil creatures with a good strategy to obtain legendary rewards. Hunt the evil in the campaign or take part on the multiplayer battles onlines.

⚔️ FIGHT IN THE ONLINE MULTIPLAYER ARENA
Fight epic PvP battles with other heroes, or the online multiplayer modes. Enter the arena alone or with friends, and prove you are the best evil hunter in the dungeons.

🏆 PARTICIPATE IN PVE/PVP EVENTS
Help your fellows dwarves in the PvE events, and compete with them in the PvP battles. Each week there is a new opportunity to prove yourself as the best dwarf.

🎮 ENJOY A TRUE ACTION RPG GAME
This mmorpg controls are designed for touch screens. Hack & Slash game mechanics adapted to mobile devices.

🎁SHARE YOUR ADVENTURES ONLINE
Explore the online multiplayer coop adventures with your friends. Cooperate with other epic heroes online to complete the hardest quests or fight against them in the online multiplayer PvP arena.

⭐️ AWESOME FEATURES:
- Play a true Action RPG adventure
- Enjoy the Hack & Slash mechanics
- Fight in epic multiplayer battles against other heroes online
- Join other heroes to complete the online coop quests
- Play PvP fights in the dungeons
- Participate in weekly PvE events
- Team up with your friends in the online coop adventure
- PvE events, PvP battles, online multiplayer battles, and coop battles can be played for free

If you are looking for a new hack & slash game and mobile action rpg game, this mmorpg adventure game will be your new favourite RPG, action MMO, online RPG, and PvP game. Will you be the best dwarf? Be prepared for amazing boss battles, legendary online PvE quests, coop multiplayer levels full of action, and a new world full of arcane magic.

Please note:
- This epic MMORPG game is free to play, but in-apps items can be purchased with real money. To restrict in-app purchases adjust the settings on your device.
- Dungeon Legends is an online ARPG game, and requires an Internet connection to play.

---

Join the Official Forum: http://forum.codigames.com

Put yourself to the test and see if you know which are the most popular search trends on Google. Do you like quiz, trivia games? Then this is the game for you! It‚Äôs easy to play, simply decide which search term has been searched for the most by selecting higher or lower. The objective is to get the most right in a row. When I first downloaded it promised you didn't need to pay to win and that hackers would be felt with - that was a lie. If your not prepared to spend a lot of money your just going to get wiped out by those who do or their hacker friends. This game isn't worth the time and data needed to play until there is a level and fair playing field.

descriptionHTML:
Google Play’s Carnaval - Festive updates you can’t resist

Build your own world in this strategy war game! War and Order is the perfect fusion of real time strategy, tower defense, and castle building games and has received several Global Google Recommendations.

Orcs, elves, and mages are yours to command in a gorgeous 3D medieval game world. Raise a massive fantasy army for HUGE fully animated battles. Clash with enemies from all over the world in real-time! Choose your alliance and take castles, slay monsters, and stake new territory as a tribe! This is WAR, and there’s never a dull moment as your screen lights up with constant new battles, chats, and upgrades!

You must battle to become more powerful than any king in history in this dangerous war game. It’s up to you, your strategy, and your allies to conquer an endless world of empires and imagination.

★HOMELAND
• Recruit and train over 50 fantasy soldiers, uniting Orcs, Elves, Humans, Mages, Beasts, and Angels.
• Your ultimate building game: Construct and upgrade tons of buildings for new soldiers, buffs, and resources!
• Research new magic and technology FAST for cutting-edge tactics and weapons!

★ALLIANCE
• Friend, feud, and chat with players from around the world in real time.
• Fight and build together to conquer enemies and build castles you could never hold alone.
• Share and expand territory for exclusive bonuses!
• But remember! This is a war strategy game. Tust no one!

★CONFRONTATION
• Sweep the battlefield in huge real-time PvP matches!
• Build your force to leviathan proportions!
• Engulf other lords’ castles as you expand your territory.

★CONQUEST
• Command and conquer other players’ castles to plunder their resources and climb power rankings!
• Vanquish roaming monsters for their treasures, from man-eating Ogres to massive Dragons.
• Play castle defense games and protect yourself and your allies from would-be conquerors.

★EMPIRE
• Not just a one castle game: Take over the Royal City to rule over the realm with unheard of power and privileges!
• Explore unknown lands to find elite resources, ancient ruins, and more surprises!
• Grow your alliance territory for richer rewards and resources!

Follow War and Order on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/WarandOrder1/
developerAddress: 1201 Orange street, suite 600, Wilmington DE, USA
recentChanges: Google Play‚Äôs Carnaval - Festive updates you can‚Äôt resist
1. Accounts can now be bound to multiple 3rd party services! A single game account can now bind 2 third-party login methods.
3. Optimized Elite Wars declaration requirements: Cannot declare on alliances that will battle within 2 hours.
summary: Build a fantasy empire! Orcs, elves, amazing graphics. Battle players worldwide!
title: War and Order

comments: As others have said, the longer you play, the worse it performs and the more space it takes up, and after a while ads start causing the game to crash. However I've managed to get around it by reinstalling every couple of weeks. Other than that it's a good little game.

It's a pretty fun game, better than I thought it would be. There is one problem, you don't really need to buy "Flooz", but if you do. The prices are a little outrageous. Like 5$ for 100 Flooz, seems a little money hungry. And 100 Flooz for 15 days is 29$ is outrageous as well. I've played other games with better things to do besides upgrading and usually 100 "diamonds" of anything would last 30 and would cost 10-15$. Seems like you're trying to rip people off. Besides the money hungry creators, good game to kill time.

It has bugs. Like how sometimes skills don't activate right away, and on rare occasions, not at all. The currencies are pretty fair; I don't feel like have to buy anything (sucks for the devs, but it's not like I can buy anything even if I wanted to). Events keep the game fresh, and I always feel like I have something to do at all times, so it does a good job of keeping me occupied for 20-30 minutes at a time.

The first idle game that caught my attention. At first, i thought that it's just "one of those idle games".. But, the more I play the more i get hooked because of unique game mechanics. I might give this 5 stars in the future.

I think the game would be enjoyable if it did not crash ALL the time. Get to a new level? Crash. Watch a video? Crash. Crash Them All might be a more fitting name for the only game that has ever crashed more than once on this phone.

Incredible game play it for hours and love it soooo much only good things to say other than server connecting but it's no big deal love the game the style the graphics the game play is all awsome I do have some ideas for the game if your interested number one being adding carnivore and herbivore types into the game so you could have dinosaurs and number 2 is world bosses were the entire community can all defeat one boss and 3 to have the ability to friend people not through Facebook. Love the game it's so good thanks for putting so much hard work into it and adding awsome features cheers

comments: This is the best life simulator game by far. Instead of just focusing on getting rich this game has many other focuses like love, nationality, jobs, kids etc. The one thing that isn't at all necessary but I kind of want to see is a avatar for the character you're playing as. Perfect game. üòÅüëç  EDIT: hi just reporting on a glitch in the game. There's an option to transition your gender bit even though my character is over 18 they can't do it. Otherwise still a perfect game.

I think it's incredible and I am hooked. Although I do hope for more such as, instead of just instagram famous, perhaps become a famed scientist, actor, writer, astronaut or business person OR be known as beloved (or not so) Educator/Teacher etc. A bit more drama added with partner/children good and not so good. Varying reactions to their dilemmas, perhaps even a child dating, married, having a child (grandkids) and other random child updates with or without the option to react accordingly. Overall, addictive and thoughtful game.

Hi - playing this game for a few months now and a big fan. I suggested during beta phase that there should be an option of money management as well. We can be a millionaire but dont know what to do with all that liquid. We should be able to invest in moveable and immoveble assets. Should be able to open a company/business and invest in other company's stocks etc. This game will be even more interesting that way. Hope we will see these features soon. Thanks.

I have been playing through the beta phase, and am completely hooked. You can pick it up and play whenever the mood strikes. It is easy to grasp, every new life is different, and it is engrossing without being addictive. Once you're done with a life you can create a new one or close the app and move on with your real one. There is no waiting for something to build or happen, there are very few ads and most are by choice to gain something. There are no in-app purchases to enhance game play, its all there from the beginning. The developers have done an incredible job with a simple concept.

Truly amazing game. Highly recommended to anyone who likes simulator games. Works without wifi and the developers listen to what u have to say. Sure, there are a few glitches but I'm sure they'll get fixed over time. Loved it Edit: can you transition your gender without having gender dysphoria

First of all, congratulations on the full release! I've been playing this game for a few months now and I'm absolutely hooked. Whenever I'm bored or don't want to use my phone's data, I just play this game. There are a few things that I think would be cool to add in or go more in depth with, but other than that, this game is borderline perfect! I reccomend downloading
description: Release a platinum album at the age of 17, or die of old age only having a few qualifications in school and not much else, the choice is yours.Pass your driving test and die in a fatal accident a year later or become a famous musician and become restricted in what you can do. Will you go to university or give it a miss?Meet different people each time you play, start a relationship. Will they be the one? Let them move in and live happily ever after. Or... Will they leave you?Jobs, and companies, are generated and are different for each game. Jobs require different qualifications to get hired, make sure you work hard and get that promotion! Will the companies CEO step down and allow you to change the company for the better?Find your perfect house! Can't afford it? Get a mortgage, make sure to keep your payments up...Each year you live contains new experiences. The ultimate life simulation.InstLife does not require an internet connection, and can be played offline.
descriptionHTML:
Release a platinum album at the age of 17, or die of old age only having a few qualifications in school and not much else, the choice is yours.

Pass your driving test and die in a fatal accident a year later or become a famous musician and become restricted in what you can do. Will you go to university or give it a miss?

Meet different people each time you play, start a relationship. Will they be the one? Let them move in and live happily ever after. Or... Will they leave you?

Jobs, and companies, are generated and are different for each game. Jobs require different qualifications to get hired, make sure you work hard and get that promotion! Will the companies CEO step down and allow you to change the company for the better?

Find your perfect house! Can't afford it? Get a mortgage, make sure to keep your payments up...

Each year you live contains new experiences. The ultimate life simulation.

InstLife does not require an internet connection, and can be played offline.

descriptionHTML:
Monthly competitions with great prizes! Compete live against your friends by playing fun vocabulary matches: learn a new language easily and naturally! Participate in the monthly Kicker-Challenge and win fantastic prizes. LearnMatch combines effective learning with plenty of fun. This language coach incorporates vocabulary training, a passion for football and the fun of playing against friends and family.

☆☆☆ NEW: Regular monthly competitions with awesome prizes: ☆☆☆ Create your own team with friends, classmates and family and play until you reach the very top!

The better app for better grades – learning vocabulary with a sporting spirit. Passion for football is not only reflected in the user interface and design of LearnMatch, but the key elements of a real football match are also mirrored in the app’s activities. And as with football, friendly competition sits firmly in the foreground alongside your personal learning progress: Play against your friends and learn vocabulary in a sustainable way.

Testing the app is free when choosing a sponsored version and you will be under no obligation to make a purchase. Also the LiveMatch feature is completely free, with further elements available for future activation.

comments: The game has gorgeous graphics. Each scene is very detailed and fun to play. Some are a little difficult to get through if you like to keep your brightness low like me and some items are incredibly tiny to find. But it has a fun premise and it's a pretty good time waster. However, you can't play for long. Each play takes 20 energy and it goes by quickly. Waiting for it to refill takes a long time. Getting stars to solve cases also takes some time. It's basically the wait time in this game that kinda kills it.

This is a really enjoyable game, especially for fans of HP and/or the fantasy genre. The graphics are beautiful and the characters look so real. I just wish energy wasn't used up so quickly. At 20 points of energy a pop you can't really play for long, and the XP needed to level up is also high so you usually have to wait for the energy to refill. Also, when you level up you don't get a complete energy refill; you only get about half. Waiting time to complete tasks is also too high IMO. At least a couple of hours if not longer. With any other game this is usually enough to turn me off but the gameplay, the story and the graphics are so good that I'm willing to exercise a lot of patience.

Beautiful hidden object experience. Offers a variety of gameplay including mirrored levels, timed levels, and spot the differences. The Facebook connection is there without being thrown in your face like some other games and is a nice subtle addition. It does work off of energy however I am willing to stick it out just for the storyline.

It's a good game but having to wait so long for the energy build up takes away the excitement of the game play. Iv noticed alot of other game users have the same outlook on this game. Even the timers for tasks take way to long.. 6 hours to complete? Really? Why so long? People will get bored and find another stimulating game. This is based on the whole wizarding world so it should be alot more magical and less time consuming.

Love the game overall but it takes way too long to build up energy. Because of this you are only able to play for very short periods of time before you have to wait for the energy to build back up. Also some of the 'inspection' actions take way too long. Waiting 6+ hours for an action to be completed is excessive. I would love to be able to play the game for more than just a couple of minutes a day. I realize it is done to encourage people to make in app purchases, however, perhaps you could provide a paid version of the app to avoid this. I love the game and would love to be able to play it more.

Love this game, but it has only 14 cases!! WTH?? The last case acted like you were going on to another one, but no. Feel like it shouldn't have been released with only 14 cases. Very similar to Criminal Case in a lot of ways. The upgrades help a lot, but it takes a while before you notice their effect and cost is too high, IMO.

description: In this game you have to do different kinds of work.You can become a woodcutter and start cutting wood. Chop it! You can become a builder performing a simple job that requires precision work with a hammer. Nail it! Or you can become a miner - take a heavy pickaxe and start spliting stones. Break it!You will come across a variety of bonus items. Cut down the stars to spend them  on new tools in the store. Break hearts and get an extra opportunity to miss. Split the clock to slow down the time.Be careful! After all, in addition to bonuses, you can also come across dangerous items that do not like to be beaten with a hammer or pickaxe. Tap them once - and the game will end.Download "Chop It" for free!Have a good game!
descriptionHTML:
In this game you have to do different kinds of work.
You can become a woodcutter and start cutting wood. Chop it! You can become a builder performing a simple job that requires precision work with a hammer. Nail it! Or you can become a miner - take a heavy pickaxe and start spliting stones. Break it!

You will come across a variety of bonus items. Cut down the stars to spend them on new tools in the store. Break hearts and get an extra opportunity to miss. Split the clock to slow down the time.

Be careful! After all, in addition to bonuses, you can also come across dangerous items that do not like to be beaten with a hammer or pickaxe. Tap them once - and the game will end.

Download "Chop It" for free!
Have a good game!

- reduced the size of the application

Love this game and love the nostalgia but there is no way I'm paying ¬£9.99 to level up on any game ever let alone one where a single tap on the screen is the only player interaction. Even with direction control etc like the old days wouldn't make it worth the price being asked.

I have had a very long conversation with someone at the hq and I was talking about the worlds. I bought the worlds on my iPad and downloaded Mario run on this device Android. I ask why my worlds that I purchased on my iPad aren't here. They don't connect that purchase with Nintendo account. When they connect everything else. Super Mario run is a great smartphone game it has the very addicting toad rally and remix ten and the simple, but very rewarding controls. The kingdom builder is a good addition but is kinda unnecessary. The only big problem I have with it is that it has to always be online. I give super Mario run 8.5/10 stars

description: A new kind of Mario game that you can play with one hand.Super Mario Run has received some big updates! You control Mario by tapping as he constantly runs forward. You time your taps to pull off stylish jumps, midair spins, and wall jumps to gather coins and reach the goal!Super Mario Run can be downloaded for free and after you purchase the game, you will be able to play all the modes with no additional payment required. You can try out all four modes before purchase: World Tour, Toad Rally, Remix 10, and Kingdom Builder.‚ñ†New mode Remix 10Some of the shortest Super Mario Run courses you'll ever play!This mode is Super Mario Run in bite-sized bursts! You'll play through 10 short courses one after the other, with the courses changing each time you play. Daisy is lost somewhere in Remix 10, so try to clear as many courses as you can to find her!‚ñ†New World Tour coursesA brand-new world of courses, World Star, has been added to World Tour mode! You can play this world after completing the first six worlds.‚ñ†World TourRun and jump with style to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser‚Äôs clutches! Travel through plains, caverns, ghost houses, airships, castles, and more.Clear the 24 exciting courses to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser, waiting in his castle at the end. There are many ways to enjoy the courses, such as collecting the 3 different types of colored coins or by competing for the highest score against your friends. You can try courses 1-1 to 1-4 for free.‚ñ†Toad RallyShow off Mario‚Äôs stylish moves, compete against your friends, and challenge people from all over the world.In this challenge mode, the competition differs each time you play.Compete against the stylish moves of other players for the highest score as you gather coins and get cheered on by a crowd of Toads. Fill the gauge with stylish moves to enter Coin Rush Mode to get more coins. If you win the rally, the cheering Toads will come live in your kingdom, and your kingdom will grow. ‚ñ†Kingdom BuilderGather coins and Toads to build your very own kingdom.Combine different buildings and decorations to create your own unique kingdom. There are over 100 kinds of items in Kingdom Builder mode. If you get more Toads in Toad Rally, the number of buildings and decorations available will increase. With the help of the friendly Toads you can gradually build up your kingdom.‚ñ†What You Can Do After Purchasing All Worlds„Éª All courses in World Tour are playableWhy not try out the bigger challenges and thrills available in all courses?„Éª Easier to get Rally TicketsIt's easier to get Rally Tickets that are needed to play Remix 10 and Toad Rally. You can collect them in Kingdom Builder through Bonus Game Houses and ? Blocks, by collecting colored coins in World Tour, and more.„Éª More playable charactersIf you rescue Princess Peach by completing course 6-4 and build homes for Luigi, Yoshi, and Toadette in Kingdom Builder mode, you can get them to join your adventures as playable characters. They play differently than Mario, so why not put their special characteristics to good use in World Tour and Toad Rally?„Éª More courses in Toad RallyThe types of courses available in Toad Rally will increase to seven different types of courses, expanding the fun! Along with the new additions, Purple and Yellow Toads may also come to cheer for you.„Éª More buildings and decorations in Kingdom BuilderThe types of buildings available will increase, so you'll be able to make your kingdom even more lively. You can also place Rainbow Bridges to expand your kingdom.„Éª Play Remix 10 without having to waitYou can play Remix 10 continuously, without having to wait between each game.*Internet connectivity required to play. Data charges may apply.
descriptionHTML:
A new kind of Mario game that you can play with one hand.

Super Mario Run has received some big updates! You control Mario by tapping as he constantly runs forward. You time your taps to pull off stylish jumps, midair spins, and wall jumps to gather coins and reach the goal!

Super Mario Run can be downloaded for free and after you purchase the game, you will be able to play all the modes with no additional payment required. You can try out all four modes before purchase: World Tour, Toad Rally, Remix 10, and Kingdom Builder.

■New mode Remix 10
Some of the shortest Super Mario Run courses you'll ever play!
This mode is Super Mario Run in bite-sized bursts! You'll play through 10 short courses one after the other, with the courses changing each time you play. Daisy is lost somewhere in Remix 10, so try to clear as many courses as you can to find her!

■New World Tour courses
A brand-new world of courses, World Star, has been added to World Tour mode! You can play this world after completing the first six worlds.

■World Tour
Run and jump with style to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser’s clutches!
Travel through plains, caverns, ghost houses, airships, castles, and more.

Clear the 24 exciting courses to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser, waiting in his castle at the end. There are many ways to enjoy the courses, such as collecting the 3 different types of colored coins or by competing for the highest score against your friends. You can try courses 1-1 to 1-4 for free.

■Toad Rally
Show off Mario’s stylish moves, compete against your friends, and challenge people from all over the world.

In this challenge mode, the competition differs each time you play.
Compete against the stylish moves of other players for the highest score as you gather coins and get cheered on by a crowd of Toads. Fill the gauge with stylish moves to enter Coin Rush Mode to get more coins. If you win the rally, the cheering Toads will come live in your kingdom, and your kingdom will grow.

■Kingdom Builder
Gather coins and Toads to build your very own kingdom.

Combine different buildings and decorations to create your own unique kingdom. There are over 100 kinds of items in Kingdom Builder mode. If you get more Toads in Toad Rally, the number of buildings and decorations available will increase. With the help of the friendly Toads you can gradually build up your kingdom.

■What You Can Do After Purchasing All Worlds

・ All courses in World Tour are playable
Why not try out the bigger challenges and thrills available in all courses?

・ Easier to get Rally Tickets
It's easier to get Rally Tickets that are needed to play Remix 10 and Toad Rally. You can collect them in Kingdom Builder through Bonus Game Houses and ? Blocks, by collecting colored coins in World Tour, and more.

・ More playable characters
If you rescue Princess Peach by completing course 6-4 and build homes for Luigi, Yoshi, and Toadette in Kingdom Builder mode, you can get them to join your adventures as playable characters. They play differently than Mario, so why not put their special characteristics to good use in World Tour and Toad Rally?

・ More courses in Toad Rally
The types of courses available in Toad Rally will increase to seven different types of courses, expanding the fun! Along with the new additions, Purple and Yellow Toads may also come to cheer for you.

・ More buildings and decorations in Kingdom Builder
The types of buildings available will increase, so you'll be able to make your kingdom even more lively. You can also place Rainbow Bridges to expand your kingdom.

・ Play Remix 10 without having to wait
You can play Remix 10 continuously, without having to wait between each game.

*Internet connectivity required to play. Data charges may apply.
recentChanges: „Éª Added a Skip button to opening tutorial.
Remix 10, made of some of the shortest Super Mario Run courses you'll ever play, is here!
There are also some brand-new courses, a new playable character, and a new feature that lets you listen to your favorite music while you play!
Why not try out the updated Super Mario Run?
summary: Remix 10 is here!
title: Super Mario Run

comments: On the advert it looks like the best game and I get two disco balls each time and merge them together and you've completed the level. Then you get the game and that rarely even happens! It's only happened once to me and I'm on level 41. Now that's saying something. It gives you a super good promise and nope it's gone out the window as soon as you get the game

I have been playing for a while now, I like almost all of the game, not too impressed that "the piggy bank " is basically held to ransom until you buy it... find another way to entice spending... reduce number of coins won or something but as the levels get hard if you dont spend money you get stuck even with team helps.. it gets disheartening and reduces interest after a while.. to the gamemakers: keep the game playable..the money will come

Update...as I go though the levels Ill get stuck for a day or two...even 3 on a level. Gameplay FUN has Dropped significantly. Moved to 3 stars as a result. If it does not change I'll continue to move to 1 star. Games are many to be played...not just stuck on a level forever!  Other issue with the game is that there's so much clicking and waiting once you win. I wish that it would just go right to the next level and it wouldn't have to wait for the splash screen. I just spend so much time wasted versus playing

Oh my gosh, this game is so much fun! I have a dentist appointment coming up, so I got this game to settle my nerves. I'm having such a good time playing, I know this will be just the thing to help me out! üòÄ Thank you üòÑ

Don't waste your time playing this game.  I got too 300 + levels but you get 100 coins for completing each level.  Unfortunately it goes in a piggy bank, which you need to pay to break starting from ¬£1.99, then next piggy bank was ¬£4.99.  It's a con!
It is now my favorite game. It's second only to toy blast. You have the best two games ever. I never get around to any of my other games I'm stuck on these two.

descriptionHTML:
WELCOME TO THE FUNNIEST CARTOON PUZZLE ADVENTURE!

From the creators of Toy Blast comes the ultimate puzzle game with unique gameplay and endless fun!

Enter the crazy cartoon world starring Cooper Cat, Wally Wolf, Bruno Bear and enjoy loads of whacky and challenging levels! Blast cubes and create powerful combos to pass levels. Solve puzzles to help the Toon gang as they travel around magical worlds!

Join the wildest adventure of your life and have a BLAST!

FEATURES:

● Complete tons of challenging levels and unlock new episodes!
● Play with unique game objectives and dozens of entertaining obstacles!
● Unlock whacky boosters to blast your way to the next level!
● Collect stars by completing levels to win awesome rewards!
● Create your own team & compete with others to rule the puzzle world!
● Receive lives from your teammates to keep on playing!
● Sync your game easily between your phone and tablet!
● Easy and fun to play yet challenging to master!
recentChanges: It's time for an inexplicable new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Mysterious circles on the crop fields, strange lights flashing in the night skies... Things will get bizarre at the rural farms as UFOs visit secluded places of the countryside! Play the new levels and see if farmers can save themselves from this enigmatic abductors from the outer space?
Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!
summary: WELCOME TO THE FUNNIEST CARTOON PUZZLE ADVENTURE!
title: Toon Blast

It said my tools needed upgrading for that one part. Please fix that bug so all repairs needed can be made with tool set level.

comments: Video adds for mobile and long answer times reslly take the fun out of it. As a f2p player you can duel up to 8 other players. If you are unlucky like me this means you cant play if they take hours to answer 3 questions! (Timewindow to answer: 48 hours) :(

Latest update: The agressive pop up ads are gone and have been replaced by video ads. Even when connected to mobile data services. I wouldn't say this is an improvement. Draining my data volume for advertisement is not nice. It's just greedy. This app is producing so much money anyways, why video ads? Wouldn't normal images be enough?  Update: The agressive advertisement is back and it's worse than ever. There are huge amounts of unauthorised browser popups partly midgame and even when the app is simply running in the background. This needs to be addressed!  Earlier: I like this app a lot. The concept behind it is great and it's great fun to play. The questions are mostly balanced aside from the annoyingly football heavy sports category. Lately though the app kept opening up dubious websitest, usually at the beginning of a round. This is absolutely untolerable (!). It should not have the permission to do this. I've been hoping for the latest fee updates to fix this - they didn't.

Too many stupid and irrelevant questions

description: Play the super fun bubble popper game! Pop bubbles and explore thousands of awesome levels filled with seriously amazing boosts, power-ups, and features. This cool game is simply ideal for your Tablet or Android device. Step into a world of sheer amusement, clear the board of all the colorful bubbles and crush your way up to the top. Match, hit and blast bubbles to reach the level target and win levels! The amazing 2 Pop Bubbles game features 1000+ of puzzle levels, highly addictive gameplay, and cool graphics and effects. PLAY AND ENJOY!- Plenty of unique levels packed with awesome challenges.- Fun puzzles and brain teasers to keep you engaged for hours!- Use awesome power-ups to complete missions and win levels.- Captivating gameplay.- Completely FREE-to-play!-  Work your way through the bubble packed challenges and reach high scores. - Bubble swap is free, just tap on your bubble to change its color.- Awesome graphics and effects.Boost your gaming experience with cool power-ups that will create big explosions and clear a path to victory:- Make 7 shots in a row to earn a fireball that will burn up bubbles on the way.- Drop 10 bubbles or more and get a bomb that will take out surrounding bubbles.Enjoy hundreds of challenging levels in this awesome game. Warm up your fingers and get ready to practice your color-matching skills! Aim and shoot 3 or more bubbles of the same color to create a line crush and pop the group. Play this game and discover addictive gameplay, filled with beautiful graphics. Start popping these bubbles on your Android phone today!

comments: Very fun game. Multiplayer is awsome! Please add private matches so i can play with friends.   Physics still need work to hold up to real world standard. Rocks dont follow thru on take outs in real life as they do in this game. Also (rules), a rock needs to make it all the way over the hogline in order to stay in play.  Thank you for making this game!

Best curling game I've seen Enjoy the graphics, controls, love the 1 on 1 against international players and career game options. Seems consistent and easy to learn. Needs a few tweaks like... throws that don't make hog line or touch hogline must be taken out of play. Have seen the bug that others reported, sometimes rock after thrown disappears , some kind of glitch that happens occasionally.  Sometimes the sweepers don't react to my movement to sweep. Would love to see 8 stones instead of 6. If you love curling, this should satisfy

Great game except for hackers. There is a hack that allows some to bump or change finish of a throw. Yoy can go from having 2 scoring to opponent having the score, changing after the rocks stopped. Developers have not replied ti report. Fine for some fun but don't waste your money in upgrades

Physics are not like real curling, rocks are dead in the house when hit, physically impossible doubles and triples, improper use of the free guard zone rules (if a rock is in the house, it is free to be removed...not in this game).  Connecting people across the globe is a cool idea but you frequently lose people and you win without finishing a game.  I've played for 35 years so I speak from experience.

Full of cheaters Started to play and it was awesome. But it seems that some people created cheats and make your pins move from their places without even theirs touching them so that they win points. I will not play it until its updated and try again. Too bad.

Not bad for free. Minimal ads. The two drawbacks are that in career mode, the game is slanted in the opponents favour too much. And in 1 on 1, it takes forever to load an opponent. Fix that and I would give it a five star rating. Also, it would be nice to see the developer actually respond to some people's concerns.

They encourage you to register the game with an email account but give you the run around should you seek to change it. The game is not worth the time nor money.

description: Prepare yourself for a battle unlike any other when you enter the 3D world of Rescue Robots Survival Games. Constant challenges await you in this fast-paced game where you must overcome every obstacle and overpower every enemy in your quest to dominate the playing field. Unlock an arsenal of powerful army-grade weapons as you progress. Use your ammo wisely and take care of your health as an onslaught of enemies are poised to strike around every corner. It is up to you to save the blocky universe from a mass invasion.After the nations outlaw nuclear, biological and chemical weapons, the military develops a new way to obliterate enemies: thousand-foot robots. The mechanical marvels work wonders, until it becomes discovered that these automatons can use raw materials from the world around them to build duplicates of themselves. Suddenly these robots where were once allies, have turned on the humans and now a new war rages. The government has called upon their every reserve and still these new enemies have refused defeat, wreaking havoc on the cities of the world.You are the world's last hope‚Äì you, the engineer who brought these monsters to life. Only you know the secret to triumph over these deadly droids. Avenging your fallen comrades, you embark on an epic journey to protect your planet from these foes and the take-over they plot. This will be no easy task, it will take all of your skills, lightning fast reflexes and quick thinking to battle your way to victory. Expect hard hitting fights and double the action as you tear through waves of enemy bots in this addictive combination running and action-shooting combat game where survival is everything. Prepare yourself, this FPS showdown is about to begin.

description: Integrate yourself into a world of high stakes deception and heart pumping action when you download, Cops Vs Robbers: Jail Break. It's time to run, shoot and dodge fellow inmates and vicious prison guards. Feel the danger as you blast through three intense landscapes and enjoy amazing 3D graphics and pixel game animations. Download for FREE today and experience a classic block game for the ages.The Underbelly of the Justice System...Due to a political conspiracy, an innocent man has been locked away behind bars at a super-max penitentiary, his termination imminent. He insists he's innocent, but there is no proof or ounce of human-compassion to support his claim. This man, is you. Meanwhile, his absence from the capitol has opened up the seat to a demonical politician whose corrupt beliefs have the capability of upturning a nation. Time is of the Essence... It's time to take drastic measures and claim your own freedom and prove your innocence before the government is overtaken by double crossing politicians and the nation as you know it is turned upside-down. Think Strategically, Fight for Survival...When the time is right, you make a break for it, knowing the inner workings of the system. Understanding this will be no easy task, but an exhausting feat of brute and intelligence, you begin the fight for your life. Cops Vs Robbers: Jail Break is a challenging first person shooter action game that is a thrill a minute experience. From the collection of hidden melee and firearm weapons and the scattering of helpful pickups to the mobs of savage enemies and the tricky landscapes, this game is ripe with intense play. Enjoy intuitive controls and massive levels that boast dangerous battles that will require quick thinking and fast reflexes. Fight your way against dozens of foes and take control over the justice system as you battle your way to freedom. The fight starts now. Characteristics: Hidden melee & firearm weapons. Collect health and ammo pickups as you explore your surroundings. Prepare for enemies to increase as levels progress. Interactive map. Choose from a variety of weapons. Expansive levels to explore.

comments: OMG ITS FINALLY OUT! I've been waiting for this to come out for like literally 4 years! Anyway so far I honestly liked the equipment system in the original version better than this one.. I don't like the whole idea of unlocking equipment you got, that just doesn't even make a lot of sense.. Plus there is an equipment list that kinda shows you what everything looks like right now so thats a bit of a spoiler for me for obtaining new gear.. Other than that, the gameplay is great! You get all 4 characters much more immediately and I do like that. 4 stars at this point but I can see myself coming back and bumping it up to 5!

No touch response. I downloaded the patch, watched the intro, connect to google play account, input name (no illegal characters) and the button to create does not light up or respond to touch. LG G5 Canadian. Will rate better when this is fixed. As the game was just released I understand there may be bugs that need squashing. Good luck!

Pre-registered for this game and it didn't disappoint. Graphics are smooth, characters are great with fluid combat system. My only bad point with it is that after a few days of playing I went to open up the game and it won't load, I get as far as the n way screen then black screen?? Please fix Devs, anxious to delve back into it.

So far so good.. pretty smooth but i guess the graphic got downgraded because i remember this game had better graphic quaLity before.. maybe add graphic quaLity option? aLso the targeting system is a bit too hard.. maybe add an option to assist targeting because it's hard to aim i kept getting missed hits.. overaLL its decent.. keep it up!

The game runs decent although you do need wifi or a very good connection for arena. Everything is very limited due to the awful energy/stamina system which will obviously be a huge downfall. It gets repetitive fairly quick and is limited on what you can actually do. Looks like it will be heavily P2W with all the store sales and again, running out of energy quickly. It's a good game for an hour here or there but for a game that you need to farm items for equipment the energy limit really ruins it. I'll be looking elsewhere for a similar game without the energy/stamina limitations

Little disappointed in the way too long forced tutorial. After stage 1-5 I decided I didn't have time to see when the tutorial would finish. I'll try again later but so far it's a fairly simple, but quality SS fighter. Which is why the tutorial seems excessive. Game just is not that complicated.

description: This baby girl is definitely asking for your professional help in this hairstyle game because either you are prepared to offer it or not you need to play it right away at least to try. First you are going to wash her hair to make it clean and nice, then you'll brush her to get rid of the extra hair, then you will make a nice braided hairstyle to make her happy. But the caring process is more than a simple washing, first you will cut off the damaged hair which has no chance of recovery. Brush the hair as long as the instructions will indicate and just apply the shampoo to offer that extra volume and shine. To prevent the dehydration and the split ends you must put on a special mask for the hair that you will do it yourself. Add the given ingredients, mix them and apply the final composition on the head. Wash the hair again, dry it and arrange the rebel hair yarns. Now all that is left is the braiding part where you will literally gather the hair and place it in the shown spot to get a nice and well arranged headdress. When you are done you can even add a nice head band with beautiful colors and details on it. Have fun and remember to play not only to get better, but to fulfill your inner passion.  You really don't want to miss these cool features presented by this hair styling game:- Free to play- Pretty easy to handle the control- Entertain yourself with quality music and nice graphics- Be a hairstylist as good as you can be in the braided area- Multitude of processes to accomplish- Take care of a dehydrated hair and cut the damaged hair yarns- Put together the strands that needs to be taken for a well executed braid- Moisturize the hair with a home made mask that you are making
descriptionHTML:
This baby girl is definitely asking for your professional help in this hairstyle game because either you are prepared to offer it or not you need to play it right away at least to try. First you are going to wash her hair to make it clean and nice, then you'll brush her to get rid of the extra hair, then you will make a nice braided hairstyle to make her happy. But the caring process is more than a simple washing, first you will cut off the damaged hair which has no chance of recovery. Brush the hair as long as the instructions will indicate and just apply the shampoo to offer that extra volume and shine. To prevent the dehydration and the split ends you must put on a special mask for the hair that you will do it yourself. Add the given ingredients, mix them and apply the final composition on the head. Wash the hair again, dry it and arrange the rebel hair yarns.

Now all that is left is the braiding part where you will literally gather the hair and place it in the shown spot to get a nice and well arranged headdress. When you are done you can even add a nice head band with beautiful colors and details on it. Have fun and remember to play not only to get better, but to fulfill your inner passion.

You really don't want to miss these cool features presented by this hair styling game:
- Free to play
- Pretty easy to handle the control
- Entertain yourself with quality music and nice graphics
- Be a hairstylist as good as you can be in the braided area
- Multitude of processes to accomplish
- Take care of a dehydrated hair and cut the damaged hair yarns
- Put together the strands that needs to be taken for a well executed braid
- Moisturize the hair with a home made mask that you are making
developerAddress: Victor Babes, nr. 15, ap. 3, Baia Mare, Maramures, Romania
summary: Play with strands and keep juggling with hair to get a braided look in this app.
title: Baby Girl Braided Hairstyles
