descriptionHTML:
Was wäre Wenn? Die verrückte Fragen-App jetzt auch auf Deutsch! Das ultimative Quiz gegen Langeweile!
Beantworte lustige, verrückte, peinliche und persönliche Fragen mit "Ja" oder "Nein" und erfahre, wie andere Spieler geantwortet haben.

Was wäre wenn...

du alle Menschen nackt sehen könntest, aber sie dich auch?
du Gedanken lesen könntest, aber dabei immer den "Gangnam-Style" tanzen musst?
du der schönste Mensch auf Erden werden könntest, aber dein bester Freund total hässlich wird?

JA oder NEIN? Entscheide dich!

● Tausende lustige und verrückte Fragen
● Schalte Kategorien frei: Serien, Übernatürliches, Musik und viele mehr...
● Wie haben andere geantwortet? Vergleiche dich mit dem Rest von Deutschland!
● Teile deine Entscheidung mit deinen Freunden auf Facebook und bei WhatsApp
● Stundenlanger Spaß für dich und deine Freunde!
● Weitere Sprachen in Arbeit: Englisch (What if ...)

comments: This game is mind blowing. The art style is great the animations and the crafting. However u can improve this great game. 1: It would be better if u could tell us what each material is and what can it be used for by adding an information section. Add more building materials. U can add a fence so that we can guard our house and more weapons and types of arrows (üî• fire arrows, bomb arrows) something like that and more clothing. Also add multiplayer (cuz it would be fun).Overall this is the hands down best survival game on mobile. TBH I thought this game would be a dark souls on mobile but no it's better than that.

I love the game, the crafting system is awesome, the gameplay is great. However, there are some points that I suggest  1. Nerf the Damned, also the Lepers, they are strong for beginners. Club can't beat them easily 2. Make another way to find leek seeds 3. Lepers can detect you sneaking to them, and they spawn out of nowhere. I don't know if it is a bug or not. 4. Cooking meat uses too much wood.  I look forward for more updates. It's a great game to be honest.

It's a good attempt but too easy to die. No water. Seriously? I have an empty bottle yet nothing to put in it. I would like the chance to explore and build BEFORE I die five times and can't reclaim the stuff I've spent time collecting.  If these things are remedied I'll try again. Till then, deleting.

Honestly it's a great game and lots of fun but that energy mechanic needs to change. I know you can walk but it's still such a strange thing to gate your players out of playing.  Maybe if you could always travel at the same speed but if you didn't spend energy you could be attacked randomly while you travel. Or if energy was used to speed up crafting. I dunno but it's the only thing holding me back from a perfect score.

This game is awesome but here are the things like really want in the next game. 1. I need to disconnect with Google play to delete my old saved progress full of mistakes. Please add this feature. 2. Zombies are too hard to beat . Please decrease some of their capabilities. 3. There must be an increase in chest slots . 4. Please decrease the quantity of wood logs to cook. Otherwise all of our hardworking to gather logs while be replaced by only a few meats and others. 6. Please add another source of getting seeds. They are too hard to get.

Very good idea but lack of some stuff like improvements. Right now the demolition system not work and we cannot move the walls or floors. The energy should be more sustainable and will be good if the trees on the base and some stuff randomly spawn. I will drop the game for now and on the future i Will give another shoot

descriptionHTML:
Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!

● EXPLORE NEW LANDS

Explore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors’ castles to obtain the most valuable resources.

● LEARN CRAFTING

Build workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands’ most dangerous inhabitants.

● IMPROVE YOUR CASTLE

Build a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don’t forget to explore your enemies’ territory to collect valuable loot.

● DEFEAT ENEMIES

Morning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!

● SADDLE YOUR HORSE

Build a stable and don’t miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.

● OVERCOME HARDSHIP

Life in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.

● BEFRIEND THE RAVENS

Build a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.

● JOIN A CLAN

A clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.

● PREPARE FOR THE NIGHT

When night descends, darkness floods the world, and you’ll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.

● RECEIVE REWARDS

You may feel alone, but you are not. There’s always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that’s the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.

● SOLVE THE MYSTERY

Search for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire’s ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.


Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! Storm enemy castles, collect loot, and rule the Plaguelands from an iron throne!

Grim Soul is a free-to-play MMORPG, but it contains in-game items that can be purchased. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.
recentChanges: ‚Äî Invisible character issue on some devices is fixed
‚Äî Game progress saving system is improved
‚Äî Rare case with empty event chests is fixed
‚Äî An issue with other exiles' corpses disappearance is fixed
‚Äî The Night Guest now comes later and less frequently
summary: Survive as long as you can. Craft your weapons and battle against cursed souls.
title: Grim Soul: Dark Fantasy Survival

descriptionHTML:
★ ★Genuine underworld strategy mobile game, play with millions of players worldwide★ ★
☆Worldwide connection, no color, language or nationality differences and together compete to become the Godfather. 
☆Clan, plunder, occupy and upheavals between gangs, intrigues, and compete for the honored seat of King of Mafias.
☆Super hardcore and ultra hectic mafia life. Struggle for power and fulfill your ‘Alpha’ dream, you’ll not be able to “stop" playing!
☆Live interactive turf war, daily battle whole year round. 

★ ★Game features★ ★ 
☆☆3D HD Unity game engine, ultimate gaming screen 
Zooming feature, 360-degrees multi-angle with well-graphic picture, providing a near real virtual reality.
☆☆Live strategy Rallying
Come! Along with brothers, we'l corner our enemy and battle if words don’t work. 
Establish your Clan's forces and wake those potential talents. 
If you don’t crush them here, tomorrow they'll crush you.

☆☆One and only worldwide server, along with professional translation system capable of translating all language to one
✔Background and communication, matters not. Here, there are only brothers and loyalty. 
✔Rule with brothers everywhere; Situate in the Coast, set aim for the vast East and into the world, unify the gang.

☆☆Four major features and over dozens of gangster waiting to be recruited ☆☆
✔ Brawlers, not even the word‘human weapon'can describe their ferociousness. To them, conflicts are just general lifestyle. 
✔ Shooters are capable of wielding all kinds of arms, from submachine guns, rifles to artillery and many more. 
✔ Bikers, with tons of heavy locomotives which move like lightning, robbing and setting things alight. Definitely a nightmare for all gangsters! 
✔ Modified Vehicle can be done from a minivan to a military Hummer. There's nothing we can't change, only what you can't imagine.

The devious pranksters are back at it again with an all new trolling nightmare: Troll Face Quest Video Games 2! Spoof iconic video games and prank the pants off all those characters. Get lost in a crazy world of video game shenanigans and try to escape the pranking trolls!
PHONE-SMASHING FEATURES
‚Ä¢ 85+ million installs across the legendary Troll Face Quest franchise!‚Ä¢ Troll famous video games!‚Ä¢ 35+ hilarious levels of pranking insanity!‚Ä¢ Unlock insane achievements!‚Ä¢ Lots of wacky collectibles!‚Ä¢ No Wi-fi needed!‚Ä¢ A funny trip through a loony video game world!
THE RETURN OF TROLL RAIDER
Get ready for a trolling adventure that‚Äôll take you back to your intense video game playing days. Troll  adventurous, monkey-swinging babes in tight shorts, steal the wheels from an Italian plumber‚Äôs go-kart , prank entire cities under the rule of theft, murder, and mayhem, and piss off birds for no good reason. Will you solve the crazy pranks and win a chicken dinner or will you end up in the loony bin? It‚Äôs payback time for all those levels you didn‚Äôt complete.
TROLLING TIME NEVER RUNS OUT
A whirlwind of trolls and pranks, this is another baffling game that will make you throw your cell phones against the wall. Keep your eye on the ball and crush the prankster video game characters before they troll you into the dirt!
Do you have the guts to prank your childhood video game stars into oblivion?

descriptionHTML:
Spielspaß und Herausforderung in einer App: Das neue kostenfreie Aufbauspiel „Mei Lidl Markt“ für Groß und Klein!

Du hast Lust, deinen eigenen Supermarkt zu planen, diesen immer weiter zu vergrößern und Waren wie frisches Obst & Gemüse, Getränke, Blumen und vieles mehr an deine Kunden zu verkaufen?

Dann bietet die Mei Lidl Markt App genau die richtige Herausforderung für dich!

Deine Aufgaben:
- Sammle Boni-Waren, um deine Filiale zu vergrößern
- Löse verschiedene Tagesaufgaben, z.B. leere 50 Mal die Kasse, um weitere Münzen zu bekommen
- Erspiele dir Trophäen, indem du z.B. eine Kundenzufriedenheit von mehr als 80% erreichst
- Meistere spontane Herausforderungen, indem du z.B. ein Rudel Möpse aus dem Markt vertreibst
- Sorge für die Zufriedenheit deiner Kunden, denn ihnen ist es wichtig, dass du frische und vielfältige Produkte in einer sauberen Filiale verkaufst

Features:
- Spannendes Aufbauspiel in farbenfroher Lidl-Welt mit herausfordernden Aufgaben
- Verschiedene Spielfiguren (Verkäufer, Kunden usw.), Waren und Verkaufsräume
- Strichcode-Detektiv: Scanne echte Lidl-Produkte für Lidl-Münzen, mit denen du den Boni- Automaten nutzen kannst.
- Boni-Automat: mit den hier erspielten Boni-Waren kannst du deine Filiale erweitern
- Statistik: Hier erhältst du jederzeit Einblick in Kundenanzahl und -zufriedenheit sowie deine Top-Produkte

Gut zu wissen:
- Die Updates zur App liefern regelmäßige neue Aufgaben und Erweiterungsmöglichkeiten
- Zielgruppe: Ab 6 Jahre
- Kindersicher: Keine In-App- Käufe, keine Werbung, keine Weiterleitung zu externen Links

Lidl Österreich wünscht viel Spaß beim Aufbau deines eigenen Supermarkts!
developer: Lidl Digital International GmbH & Co. KG
developerAddress:
Lidl Digital International GmbH & Co. KG
Stiftsbergstra√üe 1
74172 Neckarsulm
recentChanges: - Neue Filialstufe: Der erweiterte Supermarkt bietet dir viel Platz f√ºr neue Regale.
- Erweitertes Sortiment: Viele frische, neue Waren locken neue Kundengruppen an.
- Mitarbeiter-Upgrade: Du brauchst Unterst√ºtzung? Dann kannst du ab sofort neue Mitarbeiter einstellen.
- Mehr Abwechslung: Die Quests wurden erweitert.

comments: Won't let me play 1st level. The screen shows what i think is a pause menu over the game. The screen says start but it will never start no matter where you press non of the buttons work. Game sucks. I dont know how it plays because it wont let me play. Dont install this app its bugged

A good concept that needs some work.   The good.   The puzzles gradually ramp up the difficulty.   The visuals and sound are very good for the app.   Some requests   An ad free one time paid version would be nice  The game needs some tool tips. Like if you click on a object in the game. It should tell you some stats. Like power capacity and power requirements.   How about an in game Twitter and or email contact link.   Can power lines please be able to spit off into 2 different directions  The only bad  Too many ads and the ads are too long 30+ seconds.

Lovely little game. Starts out easy showing you the controls/events, but quickly ramps up the puzzle. Speech bubbles get in the way of putting lines down and cause you to lose because you only had 30s to complete the level. Adding an option for a topdown view would solve this because then you could actually see all the directions instead of only 2-3 at a time. Oh and the ads suck. Can we buy a version without them?

What the game is this....everything in the game matters...the no of poles which decides the resistance...the current flow in it indicating potential difference...3 lines conduct more than 2 and single lines...the hurricanes and disconnections indicate open circuit.... I'm an electrical student...finally finished the game...this game is fantastic...just need one more such game from STATNETT...thank you for this game....the other app ohm is also good...plzz develop one more such game!!!!!!!! THE FUTURE IS DEFINITELY ELECTRIC!!!

Creating lines maneuvering needs improvement. It's hard, I have to zoom in just to get it right. But over all, it's a nice game. Now, I get to understand the complexity. Often times, we in our area simply complain about brownouts without knowing the critical planning and action being done in the background. Kudos!
Opened to just a black screen that played music. Absolutely no indication that anything was happening. My screen might as well have been locked, except I could still swipe in the notification bar
description: Without electricity there is chaos. Balance is a free puzzle game about electricity and power grids. Your goal is to make sure there are no blackouts, that the power grids are functional, and that you always produce the right amount of power.The game offers many challenges you probably never thought about: - Did you know that the amount of power produced is changed all day and night to match the amount we use? - Did you know that there is a limit on how much power you can transmit through a single power line without it getting overloaded? - Did you know that an well-built power grid could have any one line disconnected without causing blackouts?You do not need any knowledge about electricity or power grids in order to enjoy this game. Balance is developed by Statnett, the system operator in the Norwegian energy system, and is based on real challenges they work with every day.
descriptionHTML:
Without electricity there is chaos. Balance is a free puzzle game about electricity and power grids. Your goal is to make sure there are no blackouts, that the power grids are functional, and that you always produce the right amount of power.

The game offers many challenges you probably never thought about:
- Did you know that the amount of power produced is changed all day and night to match the amount we use?
- Did you know that there is a limit on how much power you can transmit through a single power line without it getting overloaded?
- Did you know that an well-built power grid could have any one line disconnected without causing blackouts?
You do not need any knowledge about electricity or power grids in order to enjoy this game.

Balance is developed by Statnett, the system operator in the Norwegian energy system, and is based on real challenges they work with every day.
recentChanges: Fixed a few bugs and breaking issues with some of the levels.
summary: Balance is a puzzle game where you build and maintain the power grid.
title: Balance

comments: It's like owning your own transportation service like Uber or Lyft, but in arcade Crazy Taxi meets Monopoly. If you hire drivers to your service, you not only make more money, but you expand your  territory. I love the diversity of the characters, how you have new with the classic arcade characters like Axel, Gus and Gena. And I also love the concept is modern, but has the classic arcade concept and feel with the scratch cards, gems, and money. Bonuses are earned through accomplishing objectives, and of course, ads. Thanks Sega. üëåüëç‚ù§

Outstanding game. My only fuss is cars get trapped in some buildings during attempts to retrieve funds. Going back to another stage and returning to the stage I'm engaged in usually resets game play. Otherwise, great game.

It's a chilled game to play. There are a bit too many ads. And it because it is just tapping, it can be a bit boring after a while. It takes long before you get somewhere new. But all by all it's a free easy game to kill time perfectly.

Only game that has not begged for money and really is fun to play if you can keep up with all the fares driver's n cabs. Just try it yourself. It can be addicting if you don't take your eyes from it haha
To get better you must view at least 6, 30+second adverts per day. Or it will be really slow to lvl up.

For a game so heavily reliant on ads to deliver benefits to the player, it is a gamble sometimes whether or not those ads will crash the game and therefore cost you the prizes. The game itself is all right, but this gamble drags down the experience when it doesn't work.

description: Spring is in the air! Get in the mood for Easter with this wonderful match 3 game! Play over 1000 mesmerizing levels filled with many challenges. Collect the golden eggs, fill your basket with chocolate goodies and get the Easter bunny out of the magic hat. Clear the remaining ice, make the spring flowers bloom and collect the first butterflies. Eat the cookies, uncover the tasty cakes and fire off the explosive candy canes!Easter Sweeper will keep you engaged until long after Easter!There are no lives to lose, and you don't have to annoy your friends to progress. Play as long as you want. This game will fill your holidays with lots of pleasure!Swap, drag and sweep the sweet Easter pieces, like the Easter eggs, the chocolate bunnies, the creamy cupcakes, the candy stars and green spring leaves. descriptionHTML:
Spring is in the air! Get in the mood for Easter with this wonderful match 3 game! Play over 1000 mesmerizing levels filled with many challenges. Collect the golden eggs, fill your basket with chocolate goodies and get the Easter bunny out of the magic hat. Clear the remaining ice, make the spring flowers bloom and collect the first butterflies. Eat the cookies, uncover the tasty cakes and fire off the explosive candy canes!

Easter Sweeper will keep you engaged until long after Easter!
There are no lives to lose, and you don't have to annoy your friends to progress. Play as long as you want. This game will fill your holidays with lots of pleasure!

Swap, drag and sweep the sweet Easter pieces, like the Easter eggs, the chocolate bunnies, the creamy cupcakes, the candy stars and green spring leaves. Make matches of 4 or 5 to create powerful bombs and power-ups. And use the magic wand to collect a single piece. You'll be rewarded with cookies, cakes and lots of chocolates!

Be sure to share the fun with your facebook friends. Invite them and compete with them in the leaderboards and on the level map!

If you like holiday themed match 3 puzzle games, click and match, swap and match or any type of casual match 3 puzzle game then Easter Sweeper is the perfect game for you!


Check out our facebook fan page for more match-3 goodness: https://www.facebook.com/SmileyGamer

comments: This is an amazing game, but it has pros and some cons. PROS: This game has too many pros to list (two of the pros are that it's very realistic, and there's a sandbox). CONS: Engine noise that is different for each vehicle would be nice, but at least not every vehicle has the same sound. Sometimes certain "crews" (AKA Skins) don't apply to certain vehicles. It says you fell of the world when you fall off of the world.

Great game and the best part is it's free!! The only thing I can see that could use some improvement are the controls... and it wouldn't hurt to be able to change the point of view... other than that I say "jolly good show" as I tip my hat to the creators!

Way too many ads. Not just ads, it's that annoying video-kind of ad you have to watch X seconds before you can skip. After every single level. Even in the tutorial, where you need about 30 secs - 1 minute per level.

The ads never stop! videos you can't skip, two ads in between every level, you can't even exit the app with two more ads popping up and having to wait for them to close. Developer should've taken less money to make the gameplay better.

Fun for 3 minutes, then i saw the same ad ten times in a row. OMG. I get it, you have to make money, but this is ridiculous. The forced ads are unbearable. If i wanted to install Terminator wars, Clash of Clans or Bubble Witch Saga, i would have done it already.

Loved the start and finish. Got away from me a little with the desert levels... and the random water levels at the end of the city map. Would've loved more loading and unloading of trucks and as well as the construction arc you sometimes saw with buildings going up.

comments: I've tried about most of the bowling games on line and none compare with this one.  I almost had a perfect 300 game but for 1 spare frame.  You can back off the foul line and really speed the ball for a perfect strike.  None of the others can do that!  Love it.  One change please, put the high score function back into play. Finally got my 1st perfect 300 game and no one witnessed it!  ü§óüò†üëç

This is a nice bowling game that works beautifully on my 10" tablet.  The ball can be rolled slow or very fast.  The pins act as if they're very light weight.  This is a good game for beginners or anyone who just wants to bowl a quick, satisfying game. Aiming the ball is easy. I like the fact that this game connects to Google Play Games.  The ball can appear a darker color if pulled back toward you too far. Check out the ball with the hand imprint or the one with the spider.  If I could recommend one update, it would be to update the year (2014 bugs me) and prevent the ball from being snagged up by the thin black line.  Also, please relay my score rather than telling me to wait until a friend plays for comparison.

REAL BOWLING!!!!! Wow finally found a good no frills bowling game! The ball movement is wonderful! You can get it to do all kinds of things. I can launch it like a missile or granny roll and even throw yes throw!!!! IT HAVE FUN if I could give it ten stars I would.
Best bowling game on the app store There are so many games with all this unneeded nonsense, you have no idea how hard it is to find a bowling game where you just roll a ball at pins.
Crappy.. No arrows on the lanes and you can throw the ball 200 mph.. Kinda OK game if your not really looking for the bowling experience..
Great time killer The only reason I stoped playing is eventually it would not let me see my scores without having to share on internet. I would not.

descriptionHTML:
Build your own blocky Eiffel Tower, Louvre and the Moulin Rouge! Meet the french people, visit museums and explore the capital of France! Build & Craft! Ultimate crafting games for boys and girls - only in Paris Craft!

Sandbox is a type of game, where you can explore the infinite blocky world! Create buildings using blocks and become the ultimate builder! Create a Paris from the scratch! Use blocks to build and unleash your creativity! Build anything! From a cottage house to a skyscraper!

Craft items and use them to decorate your apartment in Paris. Become an interior designer - the french style! Design the wallpapers, place the furnishing like tables, chairs etc. Craft & design items to make the most unique interior design ever!

Use chat to pick up girls and boys (love story craft - you chat with computer bot - not real people!), date french girls or handsome boys! Take them to a romantic dinner in a french restaurant!

Drive cars, motorcycles or just go to a theme park! Ride blocky animals, meet the people and have your own pet (from cat and dog to a parrot or elephant!) Visit cafes, pastry shops and monuments! Meet french artists! Visit the Paris Zoo and play with cute animals such as Panda or Coala!

Become the citizen of a Square Paris! The city of art, love and awesome food! Pop in to a french pastry shop, go for shopping to a shopping centre or arrange your own wedding in the most beautiful city of Europe! Crafting, building and exploration of city of love! No need for Paris guide!

Craft & Build
Simply use blocks to create structures. Add or remove blocks to construct anything! Build a whole city! Over 300 different blocks are ready to unleash your creativity!

Play Minigames
Play minigames to enjoy your time in Paris even more. Pick up some girls and boys andhave fun! Casino, dancing and singing rhythm minigames are waiting for you!

Meet the people
Use internal chat mode to pick up girls and boys, date and have fun! Remember - you are not talking to a real person only to a computer bot! You can have your virtual french boyfriend or girlfriend!

Explore the infinite world
You can travel anywhere you want! Use cars, metro, trains or even planes and helicopter! The world is infinite! You can ride horse or ride a bike - it’s your choice. Simply craft one of the items and use it!

Become an interior and exterior designer
Use one of over 200 items to prepare the most awesome interior design of your french mansion! Chairs, tables, drawers, desks! Design the kitchen, design the bathroom and become the legend of a interior design!

Paris Craft - one of the best crafting & building games of 2018. PLAY NOW!
developer: Fat Lion Games: Crafting & Building Adventure
summary: Crafting, building & exploration of Paris, the city of art & love! Creative game
title: Paris Craft: Exploration of City of Love & Art

description: Balls Blast is uniquely designed to release your stress. Your only target is to shoot the balls before they get to the bottom of the screen.Controls are super smooth and easy, just drag left right to aim, tap for bomb and swipe up for a wipeout. Thank you!
descriptionHTML:
Balls Blast is uniquely designed to release your stress.
Your only target is to shoot the balls before they get to the bottom of the screen.
Controls are super smooth and easy, just drag left right to aim, tap for bomb and swipe up for a wipeout. That's it.
The default is one bullet but you can pick up 2 and 3 bullet powerups which will last for 5 seconds but there will be plenty of them to keep you entertained.

Try to top the leaderboard.

Have Fun and share with your friends. Thank you!
recentChanges: New Feature added to make it a little harder and more enjoyable. Thanks for playing!
summary: Relaxing Gameplay
title: Balls Blast

descriptionHTML:

descriptionHTML:
EPIC STRATEGY. HEROIC PROPORTIONS.

Meet your enemies on the battlefield, and put your tactics to the test. Recruit, train and build your army to battle and conquer every opponent in this turn-based strategy game.

Collect and recruit dozens of units to turn your regiments from a handful of militia into a steeled fighting force. Equip and customize each unit, develop weapons and armor, and master game-changing abilities.

Compete in intense PVP battles against the Warlords of Aternum community and climb to the top of the leaderboards. Do you have what it takes to become a true Warlord?

JOIN THE FIGHT
Take on the orc horde, roaming bandits and fellow warlords in intense turn-based PvE or PvP battles

YOUR MOVE, YOUR VICTORY
Make the right tactical decisions to dominate intense 3D animated combat on the hexagonal battlefield

UNITE THE LAND
Build your army from the ground up and forge powerful alliances

EQUIP YOUR TROOPS
Discover legendary weapons, and unlock tide-turning special abilities

DEFEND YOUR HOME
March through dozens of shires and explore the fantasy land of Dunmar

DESTROY YOUR ENEMIES
Hoist your banner at the top of the PVP leaderboards


Warlords of Aternum is free to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

Warlords of Aternum requires internet access to play and access its social features. Warlords of Aternum may also contain advertising.

Are you ready to join the fight?
recentChanges: Gozura is the artillery officer of the Frost-Blood Orcs. She is feared by allies and enemies alike due to her weapon of choice.
Defeat Gozura in her enclave and collect shards for a new regiment!

Once liberated, this orc regiment will blow up your opponents. This heavily armored, ranged unit provides a damage boost for all allied orcs and goblins while on the battlefield. She uses goblins as projectiles and fires them behind enemy lines for an ambush.
summary: Put your tactics to the test in an epic fantasy universe
title: Warlords of Aternum

description: Enjoy one of the best free First Person Shooters that will challenge your skills and help you to become a master of the block survival world.If you are young and fragile, expecting a fairytale, this is not a game for you‚Ä¶ We need heroes, warriors that master their skills through difficulties, always ready for the ultimate battle!**** TRUTH IS CHALLENGED****Enter a corrupt world where an evil government is working with the so-called New Intelligence, who have made an illegal alliance. Play as the hero in an explosive solo campaign where officials are covering up the truth about the dangers of guns, and the freedom of thought and religion have been all but been banned. **** YOUR MISSION ****The world is immersed in war and the fight for victory has begun, but to conquer, you must navigate the dangers of the armed enemies, who carry high-grade military weaponry and shoot to kill without a thought. It is up to you to protect the innocent and destroy those who have brainwashed the foot soldiers to obey commands without question!**** INTENSE BATTLES ****Battle your way through the edge of survival in a challenging life and death struggle as you navigate enemy territory and face aggressive mobs. Uncover hidden weapons to add to your arsenal as you move through stunning retro-styled pixel-art levels! The dramatic intensity of this undertaking is an adventure like no other, as you struggle in the fight to save the population before they are annihilated by the snipers and assault rifles of the enemy. See and feel the action while you bring down this conspiracy from the inside. You are the last guardian, unaffected by the new world‚Äôs lies. It is up to you to be the hero your people need. Don‚Äôt trust no one, you don‚Äôt have friends here, don‚Äôt get fooled by anyone.**** AN AMAZING EXPERIENCE, FROM START TO FINISH ****Hear the roar of your gun as you see another enemy defeated, always moving towards your goal! With the world at stake, Diverse Block Survival Game is difficult to put down! Battle through stunning levels while choosing from among twelve weapons collected as you play!What are you waiting for? Save the world, one block at a time!

descriptionHTML:
Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle is very classic, unique, challenging and addictive game. It’s time to install and play famous rock paper scissor classic game in your device. So let’s play the game with your friends or test your luck against the A.I and refresh your memories.

Game is simple and easy to play. Moreover, to make game interesting there are two modes in the game. You can play with artificial intelligence or you can play with your family or friends, game represent a real challenge. In this legendary rock paper scissor game you and the opponent choose a sign of your choice. If you’re a beginner and don’t know the rule of the game, don’t worry here’s a short detail of the rules of the game. First You and your opponent (friend or family) choose a sign of rock, paper and scissor that you will then compare, the rock break the scissors but covered by the paper, the paper beat the stone but cut by the scissors and the scissors beat the paper but are broken by the stone. So make wise ways and challenge the opponent.

Features
• Amazing Hd graphics to make the game more interesting and colorful.
• Play the game Vs. A.I and also against your family and friends.
• Challenging background sound.
• The person with max points will win the game.
• Simple and interesting user interface.
• Invite your family and friends and compete with them.
• Very small size of the app force you to keep it in your device.

So download Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle and start having fun by playing in leisure time.

Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle By BACA BACA Games in casual and family category 2017.

description: Hi, there are many families who daily expecting a new member. A child is a blessing for every parent and every time a baby is coming into this world is waiting with great emotion. The happiness that one parent feels when he can keep his baby in his arms is wonderful, this sensation is unique and makes us enjoy life. We all like to look like a baby smiles for the first time and we all expect the first word of the baby. Perhaps you're a sensitive child and understand what feels a parent for his child and through this game for girls you'll be able to meet a family that is going to have a baby.To be able to do everything we planned you will have to play the role of a doctor, after the baby is born you will have to take care of him because his mother is very busy.Please follow all instructions of the game to care for babies.Good luck!- The child was born recently;- This is a playful, healthy baby and you will surely love to meet him;- First you have to wash him;- Fill the tub with warm water;- Use special detergents;- Use a clean towel to remove water;- Choose the most beautiful clothes and accessories;- While the child is in his room a few bees came and stung him, he needs medical care;- You have to disinfect wounds;- You have to remove the bee pins;- Apply an ointment for the treating of wounds;- Finally you will need to apply patches on wounds;- Before starting the treatment you will have to catch bees;- Now the child feels well and he wants to eat;- Offer only healthy food;- Offer his favorite toy;- Decorate the child's bedroom;- You did a great job, the child is happy.Thank you for what you did today, you are a brave kid and please come back daily to help us through this game for kids.Have fun!
descriptionHTML:
Hi, there are many families who daily expecting a new member. A child is a blessing for every parent and every time a baby is coming into this world is waiting with great emotion. The happiness that one parent feels when he can keep his baby in his arms is wonderful, this sensation is unique and makes us enjoy life. We all like to look like a baby smiles for the first time and we all expect the first word of the baby. Perhaps you're a sensitive child and understand what feels a parent for his child and through this game for girls you'll be able to meet a family that is going to have a baby.
To be able to do everything we planned you will have to play the role of a doctor, after the baby is born you will have to take care of him because his mother is very busy.
Please follow all instructions of the game to care for babies.
Good luck!

- The child was born recently;
- This is a playful, healthy baby and you will surely love to meet him;
- First you have to wash him;
- Fill the tub with warm water;
- Use special detergents;
- Use a clean towel to remove water;
- Choose the most beautiful clothes and accessories;
- While the child is in his room a few bees came and stung him, he needs medical care;
- You have to disinfect wounds;
- You have to remove the bee pins;
- Apply an ointment for the treating of wounds;
- Finally you will need to apply patches on wounds;
- Before starting the treatment you will have to catch bees;
- Now the child feels well and he wants to eat;
- Offer only healthy food;
- Offer his favorite toy;
- Decorate the child's bedroom;
- You did a great job, the child is happy.

Thank you for what you did today, you are a brave kid and please come back daily to help us through this game for kids.

Have fun!
summary: Newborn baby care - baby games
title: Newborn Baby Caring

comments: I would have bought the ad free Version eventually, but it was so annoying even to get used to the game, that I gave up. If you want more people to buy the game you have to give them the opportunity to play without being interrupted every death. Your game can be the best ever but still no one will play it if they have to invest the same time in watching ads that they invest in playing the game.
Game is good. Ads are bloody appalling. I have to waste 30 seconds each time I die? No thank you
Alright if you like ads more than gameplay. Stuck with 30 second ads after 20 secs of play. Don't mind some ads, but this is overkill. Pass.

Edit: Ruined it because if the ads. I understand why you have them, but I was willing to watch them IF I felt like doing another round or not. Having the choice to watch one or not was nice. Now you're just forced to after death. Sorry, that's never a good idea. And no, save your copy pasted response, I don't want it. It's not genuine, and it's just a plead for us to buy the ad removal thing.  Original: The core gameplay loop is cool. It's fun, I'll keep booting it up. But it would benefit greatly by a better tutorial. As someone else said before, the ball tends to fly off and lose momentum in ways I can't seem to figure out. Might be a failing on my part, but at times it feels like gravity changes the rules at random and I'm left floating hopelessly as the void swallows me up. I'm not really sure what the optimal way to survive is
It's a great game, for users complaining about ads, it's called ad blocker. When devs force a billion ads and make it unplayable, I use adaway, game is great after, but without adaway, don't bother!

The game itself is a lot of fun, it's challenging and addictive but with ads this game is a nightmare, they massively hinder your ability to progress and learn the game which is very frustrating. I made the in app purchase to remove the ads and without them the game is flawless. I think if the ads were reworked to be slightly less regular (i.e. not every time you lose) more people would be able to appreciate the game and might be more inclined to make the in aop purchase to remove them rather than getting annoyed at them before they've had a chance to enjoy the game.

descriptionHTML:
Flow along an infinite horizon and challenge your Facebook friends in FLO. Roll your ball up and down hills to gain speed in this exciting, fast-paced infinite runner.

Use simple one-touch tap gameplay to travel as far as you can, achieve your personal best and connect with Facebook to see friends’ playing FLO, then challenge them to beat your high score!

Dodge deadly mine obstacles with one tap to flow through the horizon. Hitting a mine will reduce the speed of the ball, making it harder to beat your friends’ scores on the leaderboard.

★ Travel above the horizon to pick up speed as you roll down
★ Travel below the horizon to pick up speed as you roll up
★ Dodge the mines and flow through the horizon by tapping on impact
★ Tap and hold to glide past obstacles
★ Smash through score walls set by your Facebook friends
★ Losing momentum brings the Wall of Death ever closer. If it engulfs you, it’s game over

FLO is a beautiful game experience with music tracks by UK Hardcore act Fracus & Darwin.


Thank you for downloading this game from everyone at Rogue Games.

description: Quick and action packed dice based battles for players looking for something more than the guesswork of Battleship but not quite the complexity of Chess.* Play turn based battles in realtime in online multiplayer mode with opponents from around the world, or play solo vs the AI.* Singleplayer AI features three different play styles: Aggressive, Defensive & Balanced.* Three basic unit types: Infantry, Tanks and Rocket Artillery.* Earn reputation and gold for every enemy you destroy and for every match you win.* Level up to unlock and deploy more options like landmine, transport helicopter, fighter aircraft and battleship.* Plant landmines to surprise enemy infantry.* Use helicopters to airdrop your forces behind enemy lines.* Call in air strikes to destroy enemies on the ground.* Deploy a battleship to launch cruise missiles deep into enemy territory.
descriptionHTML:
Quick and action packed dice based battles for players looking for something more than the guesswork of Battleship but not quite the complexity of Chess.

* Play turn based battles in realtime in online multiplayer mode with opponents from around the world, or play solo vs the AI.

* Singleplayer AI features three different play styles: Aggressive, Defensive & Balanced.

* Three basic unit types: Infantry, Tanks and Rocket Artillery.

* Earn reputation and gold for every enemy you destroy and for every match you win.

* Level up to unlock and deploy more options like landmine, transport helicopter, fighter aircraft and battleship.

* Plant landmines to surprise enemy infantry.

* Use helicopters to airdrop your forces behind enemy lines.

* Call in air strikes to destroy enemies on the ground.

* Deploy a battleship to launch cruise missiles deep into enemy territory.
summary: Simple turn based strategy game with a unique mix of tactics and luck.
title: Board Battlefield

comments: This game is not good. All you do is drive to a circle so an animation takes over while the avatar rescues a cat from a tree. Or you pull in to a circle and tap the screen a couple times to close a valve. You move from circle to circle being stuck in one spot at each one. There is very limited movement during tasks. And then on top of it you do all kinds of non-firefighter tasks. Clearing logs from a street? Really? That's a public works job. Closing a water valve? That's utilities. Rescuing a cat? Come on. That's animal control. Firefighters don't actually rescue cats from trees. And the missions are short. Pretty sure I finished the game in 20 minutes.

I can not get this game to work. It says 'Your hardware does not support this application'. This has happened with a few other fireman games. I have a new Sony XZ Premium phone so I don't understand why it won't work. Can anyone tell me if I can resolve this problem?
Good game, slightly annoying at times to control movement of the characters, tend to become awkward when trying to stay in straight line. Other than that is a good game to pass the time!
Made for kids....and made for them to accidentally click the rediculous amount of adds
Very good game we get a good experience of firefighters
The hose is kinda weird on the truck... Like... the cab...

description: The Amazing Spider-Hero was a regular teenage boy before an alien arachnobeast fused with him and gave him amazing special powers! He became stronger, faster, more agile and has animal-like instincts that can help him detect and avoid dangers. Instructed by his father who is an expert in 42 forms of martial arts, including taekwondo, kickboxing, kung fu, boxing, wresting, muay thai, jiu jitsu, and many more, he made full use of his new-found powers to become a hero of justice and righteousness, donning the mantle of Spider-Hero. But that's not all, the strange Spider-Hero's great intellect also allowed him to develop many useful equipment to combat crime and battle villains. Aided by his mother, the head of a highly advanced research center, the Avenger Institute, he created various versions of his Spider-Suit each more powerful than the last and further enhances his strength, power, spider-sense, and agility. The Spider-Suits also come equipped with highly advanced Web-Spinners which allow the Amazing Spider-Hero to capture or immobilize foes with ease and play with them like a fidget spinner.Even with all that, the Amazing Spider-Hero is still just a teenage boy, he can't be out all the time. So, he must go through a long journey home while defending justice and beating up whatever thugs and monsters that may be in his way before going back to the Avenger Institute.The Amazing Spider-Hero is heading home, but many strange thugs, mutant brutes and strange mutant bulk monsters will try to stop him on the way home. Play as the Amazing Spider-Hero in multi heroic action as he jumps across rooftops, enemies, and helicopters get as far and defeat as many criminals as he can before getting home. Use marvellous spider powers like double-jumps, web-shots, and hyper-dives to fight thugs and jump across buildings! Leap across buildings, jump above enemies and become the best Spider-Hero of 2018 and beyond! Will you be the truly marvellous Amazing Spider-Hero Homecoming?Features:- Amazing 2D Graphics & Animation- Amazing Running Gameplay- Amazing Spider-Suits- Amazing Spider-Powers- Amazing Spider-Hero- Amazing FREE Game of 2018Become the most amazing superhero, defender of justice, warrior of good, and guardian of humanity in 2018 and beyond as Spider-Hero, in Spider-Hero: Homecoming. Play now and prove your heroic worth!As always, check out our other AMAZING games at Gunaga! Thank you for playing.

description: Sudoku for beginners and advanced players. Whether you'd like to relax or keep mind active ‚Äì pass your free time in a pleasant way! Get a small stimulating break or clear your head with sudoku. Take your favorite app with you wherever you go. Playing Sudoku on mobile is as good as with a real pencil and paper.Choose any level you like. Play easier levels to exercise your brain, logical thinking and memory, or try hard levels to give your mind a real workout. Our classic puzzle game has some features that make sudoku easier for you: hints, auto-check, and duplicates highlight. You can use them or complete the challenge without help ‚Äì it's up to you! What's more, in our app each puzzle has one solution. You will find all you need whether you are playing your first sudoku, or you've progressed to expert difficulty.Features‚úì Complete Daily Challenges and get unique trophies‚úì Challenge yourself figuring out your mistakes, or enable Auto-Check to see your mistakes as you go‚úì Turn on Pencil mode to make notes as on paper. Each time you fill in a cell, notes are automatically updated!‚úì Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block‚úì Hints can guide you through the points when you are stuckMore features- Statistics. Track your progress for each difficulty level: analyze your best time and other achievements- Unlimited Undos. Made a mistake? Just put it back quickly!- Auto-save. If you leave a sudoku unfinished it will be saved. Continue playing anytime- Highlighting of a row, column and box related to the selected cell- Eraser. Get rid of all mistakesHighlights‚Ä¢ More than 5,000 well-formed puzzles‚Ä¢ 9x9 grid‚Ä¢ 4 perfectly balanced levels of difficulty: easy, medium, hard, and expert‚Ä¢ Support both phones and tablets‚Ä¢ Portrait and landscape mode for tablets‚Ä¢ Simple and intuitive designTrain your brain anywhere, anytime!
descriptionHTML:
Sudoku for beginners and advanced players. Whether you'd like to relax or keep mind active – pass your free time in a pleasant way! Get a small stimulating break or clear your head with sudoku. Take your favorite app with you wherever you go. Playing Sudoku on mobile is as good as with a real pencil and paper.

Choose any level you like. Play easier levels to exercise your brain, logical thinking and memory, or try hard levels to give your mind a real workout. Our classic puzzle game has some features that make sudoku easier for you: hints, auto-check, and duplicates highlight. You can use them or complete the challenge without help – it's up to you! What's more, in our app each puzzle has one solution. You will find all you need whether you are playing your first sudoku, or you've progressed to expert difficulty.

Features
✓ Complete Daily Challenges and get unique trophies
✓ Challenge yourself figuring out your mistakes, or enable Auto-Check to see your mistakes as you go
✓ Turn on Pencil mode to make notes as on paper. Each time you fill in a cell, notes are automatically updated!
✓ Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block
✓ Hints can guide you through the points when you are stuck

More features
- Statistics. Track your progress for each difficulty level: analyze your best time and other achievements
- Unlimited Undos. Made a mistake? Just put it back quickly!
- Auto-save. If you leave a sudoku unfinished it will be saved. Continue playing anytime
- Highlighting of a row, column and box related to the selected cell
- Eraser. Get rid of all mistakes

Highlights
• More than 5,000 well-formed puzzles
• 9x9 grid
• 4 perfectly balanced levels of difficulty: easy, medium, hard, and expert
• Support both phones and tablets
• Portrait and landscape mode for tablets
• Simple and intuitive design

Train your brain anywhere, anytime!

summary: Play classic Sudoku and train your brain for FREE!
title: Sudoku

descriptionHTML:
Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten is an exciting, FREE endless talking running game for boys and girls of all ages. Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten is specifically designed for children and families who want to enjoy and play with the coolest and cutest kittens in the world!

😻Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten Features 🙀
- Dash, slide and jump to dodge obstacles and animals - don't talk!
- Chase the rainbow and catch coins with the coin boost
- Choose from 12 unique Kitty Cats, each with different accessories
- Equip the rainbow shield to smash through obstacles!
- Use a variety of exciting power ups to reach the high score
- Unlock new upgrades, cats and boosts in the shop with your coins
- Come back every day to complete tasks and earn exclusive rewards
- Great graphics and performance
- Free updates: New features and characters implemented regularly

Choose your favourite Kitty kitten and guide them through the forest and city as you try to collect as many coins as possible.

Run, jump, dash and slide to dodge obstacles and keep your Tom kitty safe in this endless cat racing simulator game, where fast reactions will be required if you want to reach the highscore! Run, surf and slide for as long as you can to earn more points, and collect powerups to double your score! Will you be able to reach the high score in Tom Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten?

In Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten once you and your cute kitty have collected enough coins, you will be able to chase the rainbow for a HUGE number of coins as the coin boost starts. Watch coins fall from the sky as you try to collect them all!

After you have finished running in Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten, you can visit the store where 12 kitties are waiting for you to unlock them. Try and collect exciting cats such as Tom, Salem the witches cat, Jess the post cat and even Princess, the most royal cat in the land!

As well as Cats, you can upgrade your powerups, buy extra boosts or even purchase headstarts so that you can whizz straight to the front of the pack on your next run! Reaching the highscore is more possible than reaching the end of a ball of wool with all of these upgrades in Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten!

Subway trains, temple ruins and city streets can all be dangerous for a cute little kitty, so don’t forget to double tap the screen and activate the rainbow shield if you are going to crash! Smash through obstacles and collect extra coins for as long as it is active!

Make sure to come back every day to complete daily tasks. These will allow you to earn exclusive and exciting rewards!

Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten Racing has been carefully designed for boys, girls and families to have ultimate fun!

Please rate us for future improvements and updates!

descriptionHTML:
That's You! is the companion app you need to play the hilarious That’s You! game for the PlayStation®4 system. Please note: This app acts as a controller. PlayStation®4 system, That’s You! game, and That’s You! Companion App required to play. PS4™ system and That’s You! game for the PS4 system sold separately.


Find out what you and your friends really think about each other in the party game where the questions are all about… YOU!

Make sure your PlayStation®4 system is connected to the same Wi-Fi network as your device and then you're ready to go. Simply follow the in-app instructions to connect.

Use this app to:
• Swipe, type, snap and draw your answers for the PS4 game
• Take pictures of yourself and your friends, then doodle on them to answer
• Create your own word and picture questions to play on PS4
• Play ‘Pass It On’ using just the app, to get a taste of the full PS4 experience
• Share your pictures and questions on social media!

The application can be used in the following languages:
English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, Swedish, Danish, Norwegian, Finnish, Russian, Polish, Turkish, Brazilian Portuguese and Mexican Spanish

PlayLink titles are all about social gaming that everyone can enjoy. Pop a game into your PS4, pick up your smartphone or tablet, gather around your TV and prepare for a refreshingly different experience – without the need for multiple DUALSHOCK 4 wireless controllers. http://playstation.com/playlinkforps4

Please note: This app acts as a controller. PlayStation®4 system, That’s You! game, and That’s You! Companion App required to play. PS4™ system and That’s You! game for the PS4 system sold separately.

The following Terms of Use and Privacy Policy apply to use of this app, depending on your country of residence: https://www.playstation.com/en-us/legal/terms-of-use/op/

Stuntman Water Run is the best action adventure game with the awesome stuntman and amazing physics. Don’t be afraid of open waters and accept the master challenges of water wipers, wrecking balls and bouncing punches in high-speed running game!

comments: Live mitspielen funtioniert gar nicht

Bitte mehr Notifications, wenn man dran ist, bzw ne neue Frage kommt. Beim Duell kann man vor der Finalfrage nicht zur√ºckgehen, um sich den Spielstand anzusehen, h√§ufig bleibt die App auch h√§ngen....  Finde die App grunds√§tzlich gut, aber es gibt noch viele Kleinigkeiten und technische Probleme.
Es werden keine Fragen eingeblendet, wieder gel√∂scht.

Die App reagiert sehr zeitverz√∂gert, was noch das geringste Problem ist. Teilweise darf ich gar nicht mitraten, weil die Frage mir nicht gestellt wird, teilweise wird die Frage nicht Mal eine Sekunde lang eingeblendet und dann war sie wieder weg. Punkte werden mir erst gegeben wenn ich die App neustarte. Die 2 Sterne gibt es f√ºr die Idee und die Sendung. Die Umsetzung ist sehr schlecht, bitte √ºberarbeiten!   Edit: die angesprochenen Fehler habe ich jetzt nicht mehr bemerkt. Daf√ºr trat ein anderer auf: mir wurde die Frage gar nicht gestellt und sofort rot markiert und ich konnte nachgucken was die richtige Antwort war (ohne das die tv-show schon soweit gewesen w√§re). Nachdem ich die richtige Antwort wusste, wurde mir die Frage dann doch gestellt und ich konnte antworten. Punkte habe ich dann auch bekommen

Die App ist im grossen und ganzen gut. Allerdings sind Fragen zum Teil einfach verschwunden, bevor man √ºberhaupt die Antworten lesen konnte. Das ist sehr frustrierend besonders, wenn man die Arbeit weiss.

Die App funktioniert schon, ist aber nicht wirklich gut gestaltet und bietet wenig Funktionen. Kurz, sie wirkt altmodisch und nicht ausgefeilt. Die M√∂glichkeit des 'mitspielens' bei der Show finde ich aber gut!

descriptionHTML:
Die offizielle ARD Quiz-App

In der offiziellen ARD Quiz App findest du ein breites Mitspielangebot zu den beliebten Quiz- und Showsendungen der ARD.

Ganz neu ist das Modul zur Sendung „Quizduell“ im Vorabendprogramm des Ersten. Hier kannst du nicht nur live während der Show miträtseln, sondern mit deinen Antworten sogar das Studiogeschehen beeinflussen! Zusammen mit anderen App-Spielern bildest du nämlich das „Team Deutschland“. Gemeinsam mit dem Teamkapitän im Studio habt ihr die Möglichkeit, um den Tagessieg zu spielen. Neun App-Spieler erhalten bei gewonnenem Spiel anschließend sogar einen Teil des Preisgeldes – ausgelost per Zufallsgenerator!

Auch bei der „NDR Quizshow“ im Sonntagabend-Programm des NDR Fernsehens kannst du mit der ARD Quiz App dein Wissen rund um Norddeutschland live unter Beweis stellen. Vielleicht bist du ja sogar heller als die „Leuchte des Nordens“ im Studio?

Auch wenn die beliebte Quizshow „Wer weiß denn sowas?“ im Vorabend-Programm des Ersten nicht gesendet wird, kannst du mit dem entsprechenden Modul in der ARD Quiz App weiter Dein Wissen unter Beweis stellen. Stell dich den kniffeligen Fragen und fordere deine Freunde oder andere App-Spieler zu einem Duell heraus! Natürlich kannst du auch im Spiel gegen die TV-Teams antreten und dich mit Bernhard Hoëcker und Elton messen.

Bei den XXL-Ausgaben von „Wer weiß denn sowas?“ am Wochenende zur Prime Time im Ersten kannst du live mitzuspielen. Entscheidest du dich zu Beginn des Spiels für das richtige Gewinner-Team, kannst du mit etwas Glück sogar Geld gewinnen – und zwar den gleichen Betrag, den auch das Publikum im Studio erhält!

Viel Spaß beim Mitraten in der ARD Quiz App!
summary: Here you can find Mitspielangebote to quiz and show broadcasts on ARD
title: ARD Quiz

Ally with players from all over the world, compete for the title of City landlord. Lead all players toresist the invasion, bring peace to your City, protect the planet‚Äôs civilization.In the world of Art of War: Last Day, you have to fight for your survival at every moment.Features:Train 8 Units of 4 types and forge powerful arms and equipment to protect yourself;Recruit strong Heroes, match the Heroes‚Äô Skills cleverly to form the most powerful Army;Upgrade your Commander, use the features of their Talents to Build the most powerful Base;Research Technology in every field in the Tech Center to increase your power;Join other players‚Äô Alliances or create your ow Alliance to face the challenge from players all over the world;When Resources are scarce, whether you should scheme carefully and wait patiently, or launch combat to plunder other players, you should always be determined to make decisions during the development process.The combat has already begun! Send an email to aowhelp@betterfun.net to contact us, or contact the support staff by tapping on the Customer Service building inside of your base.
descriptionHTML:
Art of War: Last Day is a mobile strategy game with a future theme. Build a Base, Arm your Troops, Plunder Resources, Defeat Zombies. All for your survival.

When humans fought fiercely in Doomsday war with the self-aware AI System, ADAMS, its evil plan was being carried on quietly. Discovering humanity’s real fear: their dead relatives and friends due to the war between human and AIs have come back in an unexpected way…Having experienced a certain kind of unknown cruel tests, humans have realized those cold-blooded AIs have disappeared and been replaced with those without a single thought, who only know attacking…the Zombies! The civilization on this planet is at risk!

In this epic strategy game, use your forces and strategy to defeat Zombies and out of control AI Robots.

Build your Base, defeat the out of control AI Robots and mutated Zombies. Ally with players from all over the world, compete for the title of City landlord. Lead all players toresist the invasion, bring peace to your City, protect the planet’s civilization.

In the world of Art of War: Last Day, you have to fight for your survival at every moment.

Features:

Train 8 Units of 4 types and forge powerful arms and equipment to protect yourself;
Recruit strong Heroes, match the Heroes’ Skills cleverly to form the most powerful Army;
Upgrade your Commander, use the features of their Talents to Build the most powerful Base;
Research Technology in every field in the Tech Center to increase your power;
Join other players’ Alliances or create your ow Alliance to face the challenge from players all over the world;

When Resources are scarce, whether you should scheme carefully and wait patiently, or launch combat to plunder other players, you should always be determined to make decisions during the development process.

The combat has already begun! Join Now! Defeat enemies and restore our beautiful home!

Please pay attention! Art of War: AI Uprising is a free-to-download game, with some in-app payment options. If you do not want to use this function, please disable the in-app purchase in the settings of your device.

Are you having problems? Send an email to aowhelp@betterfun.net to contact us, or contact the support staff by tapping on the Customer Service building inside of your base.
developerAddress: Suite 603, 6/F, Laws Commercial Plaze, 788 Cheung Sha Wan Road, Kowloon, Hong Kong
recentChanges: -Optimized the system frame for a better stability and game experience.
summary: Brand New Strategy Game, Battle to Win the Showdown with AI Robots and Zombies
title: Art of War : Last Day

Its a good game. One of the nicest mmorpg on the market right now. However, my only nitpick is the lack of customization of the characters. You get new armor but your actual appearance doesn't change except with outfits, but everyone has those so at the end of the day your character does not feel unique at all. The combat and navigation are on point though. Overall a good game but just lack of personal input.

descriptionHTML:
Daybreak Legends: Origin is a 3D MMORPG developed with a unique engine, it will grant you with both great combat and exquisite 3D graphics.

The game brings you seamless combat with thrilling blows and various combos! You have lot of things to do in the game including various raids and duels, ranked matches, guild wars, warpet battles and dragon airfights. A great variety of game modes will definitely meet your demand for adventure!

●Background●
The evil dragon comes, bringing disaster and war to the world. Only the legendary artifact can destroy the evil forces and retrieve light. In order to find the artifact and eliminate the evil, brave adventurers have embarked on a journey into the unknown.

●Features●
-This MMORPG brings you Skywings System, Aerial Battles
-Fly freely in a stunning 720 degree panoramic view only in Daybreak Legends: Origin
-Aerial Battles System takes your battle to the air, ground combat skills and effects will all be mapped to the aerial battles

◆Visual Feast
-Stunning 3D graphics and combat effects
-720 degree panoramic view
-Exquisite character art and design

◆Wide Variety of Gameplay:
-As a MMORPG, Daybreak Legends: Origin provides intense Real-time PVP&GVG battles
-Call on cool champions to battle epic bosses
-Start a romantic relationship and have fun with your friends based on the unique marriage and social system

◆Upgrade and customize your character
-This MMORPG provides 4 classes, Puppeteer, Mage, Bounty Hunter and Warrior, along with 243 skill combination

description: Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas - an action game with a unique gameplay. The protagonist is a gangster who was in a state of free fall in a mine filled with various obstacles. Your task is to manage to bypass obstacles in order to prolong the already short life of a real gangster.But do not think that we threw this dangerous guy into the thick of events without the right to survive. At your disposal will be bonuses that will increase the chances of survival, such as winding time, jerk and others. But whatever you do, this gangsta will still die, the only question is how many meters will he live, falling in an infinitely low mine. Use all your strengths, do not let the bandit break into a cake in the first 10 meters.Compete with your friends, whose gangster will fly the longest distance! It all depends on your reaction and your skills.Features of Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas- 3D game from the third person in the style of San Andreas- Real gangsters like in games or Gangster- Unique gameplay based on free fall- High performance on any device- Convenient management of the game- No Weiss City, only Gangster in free flight- Fascinating drop down- Music that complements the gameplay- Realistic graphics- The best game about Basejumping, Wingsuit and skydiving- Dynamic mapThis is a runner based on free fall, and unlike other runners, there is complete freedom of movement.Attention:Use the joystick on the left side of the screen to move around, and also operate the camera on the right side of the screen to look around.
descriptionHTML:
Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas - an action game with a unique gameplay.

The protagonist is a gangster who was in a state of free fall in a mine filled with various obstacles. Your task is to manage to bypass obstacles in order to prolong the already short life of a real gangster.
But do not think that we threw this dangerous guy into the thick of events without the right to survive. At your disposal will be bonuses that will increase the chances of survival, such as winding time, jerk and others. But whatever you do, this gangsta will still die, the only question is how many meters will he live, falling in an infinitely low mine. Use all your strengths, do not let the bandit break into a cake in the first 10 meters.

Compete with your friends, whose gangster will fly the longest distance! It all depends on your reaction and your skills.

Features of Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas

- 3D game from the third person in the style of San Andreas
- Real gangsters like in games or Gangster
- Unique gameplay based on free fall
- High performance on any device
- Convenient management of the game
- No Weiss City, only Gangster in free flight
- Fascinating drop down
- Music that complements the gameplay
- Realistic graphics
- The best game about Basejumping, Wingsuit and skydiving
- Dynamic map

This is a runner based on free fall, and unlike other runners, there is complete freedom of movement.

Attention:
Use the joystick on the left side of the screen to move around, and also operate the camera on the right side of the screen to look around.
summary: The best simulator of falling real Gangster!
title: Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas

descriptionHTML:
Anti-Terrorist SWAT Team FPS is a game trying to portray a story of an army commando whose mission was to save his nation from all the evil eyes. Our mission is to take all those responsibilities which are used to be fulfilled by a commando hero. It makes you feel like a sniper. Fight with enemies as the mighty Warrior, crush them with the Gunner Shots and rain down fire upon them as the Hellfire, or charge them down as the imposing Gunner Combatant. The game features multiple interesting levels with immersive environments and landscapes. The game uses latest 3D development technologies to provide you the best gaming experience on mobile devices.
The main part of this game is that this game is an action packed frontline war game. Shoot and kill your enemies with modern techniques of 2017. This simulator is full of exciting levels. It is having multiple levels. And in order to get into the next level you have to fulfill the task before specific time duration given in every stage. And every stage itself is having some tasks full of excitement. Fight like a commando and make your fellows safe from being killed and extreme fear. If you survive till end than you will be given more rewards and bonus counts after you try to run from this evil mania. Download this Anti-Terrorist SWAT Team FPS now and start your exciting journey to win all the missions. Experience the thrill of modern terrorist warfare as you fight a critical strike operation as a counter-terrorist or aim to cause destruction as a terrorist.Anti-Terrorist SWAT Team FPS is a shooting where you will fight in with your enemies in every stage. Futuristic environment of this game will take you to the real world of warfare. This game will make you remember your childhood memories of playing an action packed fighting simulator. It’s a free game with a bunch of missions. We wish you once again to have a great time. The main thing about this game is that it’s free of cost you just have to download it by a single tap. Come! Let’s have a battle with enemies. Let’s start this game.

Key features for Anti-Terrorist SWAT Team FPS :

• Stunning & High Quality 3D Graphics
• Amazing 3D indoor environment
• Easy and fun to play
• Interesting Game Play
• Stunning & High Quality 3D Graphics
• Multiple challenging levels
summary: War has started. Be real counter terrorist team hero and clear area from enemies
title: Anti Terrorist SWAT Team FPS

descriptionHTML:
The high-powered action adds to the excitement of the game. In the game, the world seems to transform into a battlefield and you become the warrior.

In the introduction of the game, the entire town spot an alien in the sky. The enforcement officers have issued a warning to everyone for staying inside the door. As an experiment snaps wrong, you get max powers which many people believe to be a threat. Many terrorist groups come to prove their powers and eliminate yours and have to exhaust your life under the high protection of Government.

As you enter the world of danger and mess, you have highly powerful enemies to face. You collect various perks and blocky weapons during the fight.

comments: The game is okay it has a lot of faults. The matching system is horrible it always puts me against people that are hundreds of levels higher than me. And somehow their money regenerate quicker and they're able to send  out more and bigger and better units out on the battlefield. Even when the matchmaking system puts me against somebody my own level their money regenerates quicker than mine and they send out a lot more units faster than I can for whatever reason. Uninstalling this game

I absolutely love this game! As a person who enjoys strategy games, from RTS such as Stronghold, Supreme Commander, and C&C, this game takes my top 3 for the phone. The match making system is very good at keeping same skilled players together, as well as it isn't very much a pay to win game. The units are decently balanced and the game isn't to slow or fast. Definitely a game I will keep playing for a long time. I do want to ask, if you guys will be putting in a "survival mode", and withstand against waves of enemies. Great job FourThirtyThree

I'll update whenever I can actually play the game. It's up to date. I get to the screen that asks if I'd like to use my Google account or Facebook account. I do not have a Facebook. Obviously I have a Google account. I'm writing this review. I click Google and both options disappear. It sets at that screen where the two options were previously available and nothing happens. I made sure to wait around 5 mins to see if it was a loading issue.. dunno. I'd love to try out the game.

This game is awesome, it reminds me of Guns Up! . The ONLY thing I don't like about it is it's basically pay to win. It's very unique in it's actually a wonderfully crafted game and not some thrown together garbage. I probably will end up throwing money at it only because it's made so we'll. But like I said I do feel the process for opening chests is a bit too cash hungry...

description: Fight, kill, survive! Tired of the mundane grind of daily life? Do you crave that indescribable thrill that gets you all pumped-up? Then Survival Squad  is for you! You‚Äôll be dropped on a realistic 3D deserted island, with mountains, rivers, gas stations and houses galore, ensuring that no replay is ever the same. This unprecedented survival simulation game allows great freedom of gameplay: go parachuting, start a gun-fight-slash-car-chase, or rob other players of their resources and watch the poor weaklings squirm and cry‚Äîhere in Survival Squad your imagination is the only limit. Join thousands of others on your server and try to outlive the other players on the island‚Äîafter all, only one out of all 100 may leave the arena alive! Once you die, you‚Äôre eliminated‚Äîit‚Äôs that simple. Straightforward, minimalist and cruel, this Battle Royale is not for the faint-hearted. No unfair mechanics, no random draws. All players start bare-handed, and have to acquire weapons on the way. All you can rely on is your skill and your chill! Now, better get ready for the adventure of your lifetime. The last one standing just might be you!Contact us:survival1121@gmail.comFacebook:https://www.facebook.com/Survival-Squad-1639926989420891
descriptionHTML:
Fight, kill, survive! Tired of the mundane grind of daily life? Do you crave that indescribable thrill that gets you all pumped-up? Then Survival Squad is for you!

You’ll be dropped on a realistic 3D deserted island, with mountains, rivers, gas stations and houses galore, ensuring that no replay is ever the same. This unprecedented survival simulation game allows great freedom of gameplay: go parachuting, start a gun-fight-slash-car-chase, or rob other players of their resources and watch the poor weaklings squirm and cry—here in Survival Squad your imagination is the only limit.

Join thousands of others on your server and try to outlive the other players on the island—after all, only one out of all 100 may leave the arena alive! Once you die, you’re eliminated—it’s that simple. Straightforward, minimalist and cruel, this Battle Royale is not for the faint-hearted.

No unfair mechanics, no random draws. All players start bare-handed, and have to acquire weapons on the way. All you can rely on is your skill and your chill!

Now, better get ready for the adventure of your lifetime. The last one standing just might be you!

Contact us:survival1121@gmail.com
Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/Survival-Squad-1639926989420891
summary: Survival Squad is a Battle Royale Game.100 Fighters. 1 Winner!
title: Survival Squad

comments: Got 4 stars for the creepy factor.  This game was released,I think, for Halloween 2016 on PC.  I'm starting to investigate a bit more before buying but have purchased just for something to do in my spare time.  Not too far in but there are things to collect and the map does transport you.  So far no problems with picking up items or lagging.  Will update if I encounter any problems.

Yay, a new game for us Android users!  And it was wonderful........ my favorite part is the Match 3 that you can play instead of some of the Hidden Object puzzles.   Has all the other Bells and whistles that I've come to expect in a game.   Thanx

Lots of bugs. Awkward games, one where you are supposed to move a receptionist figure through double doors to win, first the figure looks like a toy soldier or a doorman not a receptionist. Controls are very spotty. Sometimes good often times not. Very disappointed that Eipix would release this game with so many issues. Clearly this platform isn't BF's focus because we haven't had a good game since last year.

Finally!  Big Fish finally gave Android gamers a new game!  A GREAT GAME!  I enjoyed every this game so much!  WELL DONE again EIPIX! Game has customizable difficulty settings, hidden morphing objects throughout (with a spinning spiral that is lit up so you know to look and stops spinning if you've found it.) This is GREAT so you're not so distracted double checking yourself that you don't enjoy the game,  bonus chapter, teleporting map, souvenir room that has a little more than just looking for objects AND strategy guide! My ONLY complaint is NO zoom‚Ä¢in that stays after you click objects.  But still money well spent!  Hopefully we won't have to wait 3 months for another new game!

Phantasmat rein of shadows. Just trying to figure the game out. Now I am at the washer where I need to fix the circuit board and I keep crashing please fix this! Back when finished. Finished finally! Great game! Once you fixed the problem the game played fantastic! Looking for a great sequel!

Another dark and creepy Phantasmat, a game in the fine tradition of The Ravenswood Mysteries. Was it perfect? No. Was it gripping? Yes. All the required features of morphs, maps, souvenirs, interactive HOPs, mad scientists, weird voice overs and a great variety of locations. And the usual whimsy in Eipix credits. And yes, Eipix team, you DO need to sleep.
