comments: It feels like it was a soccer game that they changed a few thing to make it a hockey game.  That said it's not too bad.  I don't understand the finance part and there is no where to explain it.  The transfer portion is odd too.  The player got way more expensive with the last update.  It is irritating that I can't afford to sign my prospects once they are fully realized.  If I develop a 71 rated prospect it will cost me $700000 to sign him.  That is approximately 300 coins.  I could just let him walk and use those coins to sign 2 73 rated players... It makes no sense.  I have to forgo upgrades to afford to sign prospects.

I like the game. You can do good if you put some thought into it. My only  complaint, is that I didn't make it to the next level at season end which is fine but why did I get reset at the minimum for that level and I check the standings and there are teams that already have enough points to make the next level?  I'm 15-0 in my season and still 100 pts behind the leading team and not even in the top 1000.

I'm really confused as to why I can only win games if I'm 10+ overall better than my opponent. If we are even close to the same rating I get my butt kicked. It's absolutely ridiculous and seriously makes the game not fun.

Abritrary garbage.  Great concept, poor execution.  Built a solid team and still lose even when ratings are better then opponents consistently.  Out shoot the opponent 97-8 and still lose.  Recommended if you need an exercise in futility in your life.
Not a bad game, but I've noticed lately that the "reimbursed" money from voided contracts doesn't get added to my in-game wallet. Which is annoying since I need it to sign players.
Game updates hurt you. Increased value of players to sign yet, left my teams wallet short. No fun when, updates cost me more money.

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the best taxi service in the Big Apple!

Revel in the magic of New York City! Pick up passengers from the busy streets of New York City and drop them off at their desired destinations on time. NYC Fastlane Taxi Driver is packed with thrilling missions in the crowded streets of the city that never sleeps! It’s a dream come true! Experience first hand different exciting, urban neighborhoods. Drive by famous fast food and shopping advertisements; make a trip around Times Square; embrace famous skyscrapers like the Empire State Building; and race through rush hour to get a surge in wages! With realistic simulation, and mesmerizing 3D graphics, don’t miss out on this trip!

Maneuver your taxi around traffic and other diverse vehicles like trucks, luxury cars, buses, and motorcycles. Watch out for those pesky bicycles that the city is notorious for! Beat your competition: trains and public transportation. With good service, you’ll have customers swarming to you! But be careful… measure your time and limits wisely. descriptionHTML:
The best game for girls this summer now with new super cool activities: boat party, ice slush and dolphin rescue!

Join the Sweet Baby Girl Summer Fun club and play the best summer holiday games for kids and toddlers! Spend your summer at the beach near the ocean with Sweet Baby Girl and her friends in a paradise seaside resort. From animal care and ocean clean up to delicious snacks and beauty makeover, these girls have many plans for summer. Have fun exploring 12 amazing activities and play the games that you love!

Sweet Baby Girl Summer Fun 2 games for girls:
· Girls always take their pet pony on holidays! Take care of this cute little horse: clean up the mess, dirt and spider webs in the stable, shower the pony and make a beautiful hairstyle!
· Oh no! Little dolphin is in danger, help him! Rescue the pink dolphin from trash in the ocean, wash it with a sponge and make this precious ocean animal happy again!
· Refresh with the best frozen fruit ice slush! Slice, chop and blend fresh fruits with ice, fill the glass with this frozen rainbow color drink and taste it with your summer friends!
· Sweet Baby Girl and friends are planning a boat party but the ship is a mess! Clean up, wash, scrub, polish and makeover the boat, paint it pink and gold, and get ready for the best boat party before the sun goes down!
· Makeover time! Start in the Shopping Center, mix and match different clothes and colors, and design the perfect boat party outfit!
· Visit Hair Salon for a new hairstyle! Wash, dry, comb, cut and curl hair to make the most beautiful haircuts and hairstyles. Dye hair in bright summer colors and decorate with the most fashionable holiday accessories!
· It’s a really hot day in the summer resort. Make the most delicious chocolate, vanilla and strawberry frozen ice cream for the girls!
· Now the girls are looking for a fancy manicure, learn how to do one! Clean up, cut, and shape the nails, paint them pink and decorate with cute pictures, flowers and stripes!
· Sweet Baby Girl and friends are hungry, time to make the most popular holiday snacks - hot dogs! Grill sausages and heat up hot dog buns, add vegetables and sauces, and serve hot dogs to your little clients!
· Decorate the fancy villa where the girls will be staying this summer and plan a chill area with chairs and sun umbrella!
· More summer fun inside: collect summer postcards and watch summer videos for kids!
· Collect coins and use the to unlock new dress up and decoration items!


- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

ABOUT TutoTOONS Games for Kids
Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games cherish the childhood and help children learn the basic life skills through the games they love. Dress up games can develop creativity and art skills, cleanup games build good every day habits, cooking games show how to help parents at home, pet games teach to share and care. These are just a few examples how TutoTOONS games let children explore the world around them and develop on their screen time.

IMPORTANT message to parents
This app is free to play but there are certain in-game items that may be purchased for real money. By downloading this app you agree to TutoTOONS Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

comments: Very fun and time killing. I play with my bf and 2 friends and we all try to beat eachothers high scores. It can be pretty competitive. Im prob gonna try to get more ppl to play with me too lol. There could be more variety in the blocks, and there should be like different modes, just an idea

Its cool and all but needs some extra features.  Maybe a way to store 1 brick for later or some level advancement.  Maybe challenges or a power up system. The game is addictive but its very basic. with no real progression path,  other than beating your own high score, it becomes boring.  Still,  thanks for what it is.

What they show on the preview and what it gives you in game don't even match. They make it look like it so easy. You cannot rotate the pieces. The pieces they give are so random, and most games you can barely get past a couple of turns before you can't place anymore and you lose.
Would like to sometimes when my score is really high get a second chance to redeem myself. Other wise I like the game - kills some time when neededüëç

This is very deceiving. It looks like it's Tetris, but it's not. The pieces don't come down like the pictures show. I hate apps like this who deceive people to believe its a certain game when it's not just to get people to download. Will never download a game from this developer again.

Love the game can't seem to put it down. Great time passes while you're waiting for your washing to dry at the laundromat, beats watching it spin around. Not happy with all the adds popping up after every game and sometimes in the middle of a game.

description: Do you like to participate in the epic battle with brave teammates, fight with opponents and make cool new friends all around the world? There is a short story ‚Äì you are in pvp situation, you are making a great shot and your opponent is out of the way. Can you imagine this? You are one of the greatest heroes of Crime Revolt‚Äôs world now. Also this shooter has one important feature ‚Äì every combat, in which you are in, is from first person. What is more, you can play versus gamers worldwide in the 3D FPS. There are a lot of different modern arms, using them you can fight with bad guys in different ways. Direct your fury in the right way. Equipment includes different items like hats, masks, armor and sets. Extra opportunities: invisible people, coolest guns and specific shooting. Swat your enemies and become a soldier number one. LocationsHere you have a lot of different maps. We created maps of all sizes for different first person roles in the game: sniper, spy or participant of tank battle. Portable worldwide connectionIn our new shooter gamers all around the world make new friends because of their connection in one gameplay. descriptionHTML:
Do you like to participate in the epic battle with brave teammates, fight with opponents and make cool new friends all around the world? Download app with exciting multiplayer and become an assassin in the great world war!

The main idea of Crime Revolt app
This shooter was created special for people, who like shooting online in virtual reality just for free. It is a great opportunity to feel like a real soldier with guns and other arms or like a sniper, who tries to prevent a great boom of shotgun.

There is a short story – you are in pvp situation, you are making a great shot and your opponent is out of the way. Can you imagine this? You are one of the greatest heroes of Crime Revolt’s world now.

Also this shooter has one important feature – every combat, in which you are in, is from first person. What is more, you can play versus gamers worldwide in the 3D FPS.

There are a lot of different modern arms, using them you can fight with bad guys in different ways. Direct your fury in the right way. Equipment includes different items like hats, masks, armor and sets.

Benefits
Collect coins and experience, use them to upgrade your stuff in modern way and use it in the combat to win. Deal with new challenges every day and get the rewards. Extra opportunities: invisible people, coolest guns and specific shooting. Swat your enemies and become a soldier number one.

Locations
Here you have a lot of different maps. We created maps of all sizes for different first person roles in the game: sniper, spy or participant of tank battle.

Modes
Our free online game offers a lot of different modes for gamers such as Team Deathmatch, Battle with Zombies, Capture the Terrorist’s Points and Sniper Arena. Send to glory dozens of zombies in infection mode. Just run and stop zombie crisis!

Portable worldwide connection
In our new shooter gamers all around the world make new friends because of their connection in one gameplay. It is a global network of people, who like an army of fans of shooting, game strategy and saving the world from bad guys.

The main features are:
Well-timed updates
Advantageous offers
First-person action
Excellent 3d-graphic
Connection with like-minded people all around the world
Chance to show and upgrade the force and critical thinking

Crime Revolt is portable application. You always have it in your pocket and you always can show your force and fury. Download fun first person shooter now!

description: Lead your brigade of heroes to a war against Tetracorp corporation in the best shooting game. Build your frontline strategy in the battlefield and kill your enemy from all sides. Face limitless ops action in the online tournaments game mode.Take your weapons from a killing arsenal and level up your soldiers with unique shooter skills. Do you accept the challenge? TRY THE NEW ZOMBIE EVENT! KILL THE UNDEAD AND BE A HERO!COVER FIRE FEATURES- The New Shooter experience. Join the resistance and Command this revolution like a real war hero. Take your weapon, strike the enemy army with a hail of bullet, grenades, massive guns. Release the Fury of this War! - Modern CONTROL that bring you an UNIQUE and immersive FEELING. Connect your finger to the trigger. PRESS and SHOOT! - HD Graphics with DESTRUCTIBLE ENVIRONMENTS, detailed scenes full of particles and grapeshot.. Everything interacts with you and your soldiers.  - Become a real veteran soldier in the ONLINE TOURNAMENTS MODE, put yourself in a frenetic and dynamic adventure with NON STOP ACTION against other assassins players. Don‚Äôt stop shooting with the best commando and sniper mission game. - Supply yourself with a HUGE REAL ARSENAL. You have never seen so realistic guns in shooter games: pistols, shotguns, rifles, snipers, grenades‚Ä¶ feel like a real frontline commando! - Face the battlefield from different perspectives. Alternate among your mercenaries in REAL-TIME, find the ultimate combination to win the war in the ultimate killing game. - Set up your ASSASSIN SOLDIER squad with their unique skills: hacker, sniper, demolition man... Unlock new EPIC CHARACTER like the bazooka-man or the gunslinger! Have you ever seen an inflatable dinosaur on the battlefield?  TETRACORP is occupying several areas over the planet suppressing the villages, taking over their resources, and controlling every single communication. A new resistance has born and it‚Äôs time to eradicate this menace. Set your brigade of mercenaries and start the journey to battle, prelude of the biggest war the Earth has ever seen. The discovery of a new material, the element 115, it can decide the fate of the mankind and it can not fall in the hands of Tetracorp. In Cover Fire you will be the hero who lead a squad of veterans through sieged cities, deserts and fields taken by guerrillas, and defeat all kind of enemies in the war game with the biggest graphic, greatest arsenal and the best gameplay on the store. The ultimate war experience. Intuitive controls designed to create an entirely immersive sensation. Take cover, aim, shoot and eliminate this hazard. Don‚Äôt let the terrorists own the world in the best military shooter game ever! As the leader of the rebellion, you will face the army of the enemy corp: elite soldiers, lethal special units, mechs with impenetrable shields, powerful tanks‚Ä¶ Take the control of the battlefield, deal with the conflict as a real war machine. Become the legend of this world war in the most addictive fps multiplayer.  - Challenging Story mode. Fight against Tetracorp and lead a mercenary riot on every mission. The best gameplay in the most engaging shooting game ever. - Feel the new experience unique in shooter games. Press the screen, pull the trigger and shoot!. Destroy and annihilate all the bad guys with your powerful weapons and your well-assembled team of heroes! - Upgrade the skills and abilities of every member of your band: make them faster, stronger, more lethal. Equip them with the best guns and gears. Level up your commando squad and lead them to victory. Limitless shooter action!   Will you be able to annihilate all the enemies in this bloody war? Welcome to the Resistance. Welcome to Cover Fire.  VISIT US: http://facebook.com/CoverFireGame/http://generagames.com

comments: Such a shame. The game is great, really enjoyed the concept however it is a prime example of how monetisation strategy can ruin a game. Gems too difficult to earn without buying them, and purposely easy to accidentally spend them. Too many ads too. I'd rather have paid for the game. Deleted it after a  day or so.

Not What It Used To Be  The second to last update I did for this app switched the aim of the ball to slightly off from where you point it. So now have to compensate (guess a bit) when you're aiming which makes play more challenging.  Likewise, levels beyond about 440 are becoming impossible to beat w/o saving like a weeks with of bonuses to use on each level. Beating one level a week is hardly fun anymore! I may be uninstalling this app soon.
Everything has been great till about 1 month ago when the graph is slowed downed. After you start off there's delays in the line of balls and very unsettling it's not continuous anymore.

Game has so much potential and is a blast. I'm giving it a bad rating because gems are insanely expensive and they have so many buttons to hit to "use 200 gems to remove 3 lines" as one example or another to lose 200 by placing the button right above the back button on a phone. Super lame move on devs to intentionally take insanely expensive gems from us by mistake. No confirmation or anything, just boom, gone. Lacks ethics to say the least rinow
Games fine. I refuse to rate a game well when it's annoying ads start pushing political agenda against gun owners. Will go elsewhere
Great game.   But one of the adverts is a virus.   The IG Academy advert wrecked my game and now my phone's being a pain in the ass

descriptionHTML:
Tap the Bored Button and start your journey into series of games specially selected for you. A new addictive game will always be ready for you to play with every tap in just seconds. It is all free and it will always be free. Start surfing now!!

Downloaded by over 2 Million gamers in the first 6 months and featured in 20+ countries…

**The Game Collection**

The game collection of Bored Button consists of more than 100 games from wide range of genres. From brain teasing puzzle games to featured new arcade games, from friv games to classic board games are in the same collection and they are ready for you to enjoy with just a tap.

Some of the Popular Puzzle Games;
Maze; Jelly Doods; 100 Blocks; Ojello Puzzle; Pebble Boy; Hexaginta; Ancient Blocks

Some of the Popular Arcade Games;
Balls; Color Valley; Go Down; Teo’s Escape; Let’s Park; Geometry Rash; Virus Attack

Some of the Popular Friv Games;
Babel; Monster Rush; Gunmach; Sticky Goo; Sky Race; Paint Boy; Crazy Wheel

Some of the Popular Board Games;
Four Colors; Connect Four; Master Checkers; Master Chess

And many more games in many more genres are available for you to surf through and enjoy your time :))

**Recommendation System**

First you will be served a pack of new games in an order to analyze your game taste, then a new game which is calibrated to your personal taste will be presented to you.

If you like to play unique puzzle games like Ancient Blocks, then friv games will not be presented to you, games like Hexaginta will be prepared for you next. But if you like friv games like Sticky Goo then games like Babel will be ready for you to play with your next tap.

We get that your game taste can change time to time, in that case the system will detect the change and adapt the following games on-the-go to find your next favorite game.

**Create Your Own Games List and Play Offline**

While surfing through games, you will of course love some of them more and want to be able play them whenever you want. So you can add the ones you loved to your favorites by just tapping the plus icon at the menu and save it to your personalized games list which will always be free and available for you to play.

While you are saving the games and creating your own list, the system will analyze your most liked ones and save them for offline play so you can enjoy Bored Button even when you are in an airplane or a subway :)

We will also be having some surprises for you when you are playing offline. The system will save some of the hand-picked new games for you to discover and enjoy; even when you want to play offline.

**Low Memory Space**

For those of you who have low memory space in their phone, we thought of you too. When you download Bored Button and start playing, it will analyze your memory space and save the games to your phone accordingly. We do not want to overload your phone by loading games that are not suitable for you. For example If you have 100 mb space available in your phone, the system will be saving most suited, low storage games for offline mode and it will only block max 50mb of the storage.

**No More Searching for New Games**

Just give it a go and start playing now. You will be addicted to the smoothness and have fun with the flexibility of discovering a new game . There will be no need to search for a new game when you get bored of one. For your own convenience, we do that for you. It is now just a tap away to discover your next favorite game with Bored Button.

**No Need to Update for New Games**

We are constantly adding new games to the database. Despite other gaming apps, you do not need to update the app every time you want to play a new game.

You can play the most popular new games in just seconds by just tapping the button again.

Download it now for free!!

For any inquiries please contact us through info@gabblestudios.com
summary: Discover many addictive games with every tap, save to favorites to play anytime.
title: Bored Button

description: Ping Pong is one of the most practiced sports in the world. Not only in China, where it has been declared the national sport, but in all countries around the world people play Ping Pong for fun or on a competitive level. With our brand new app you will have both, a lot of fun and a nice competition while trying to beat all the other countries from around the globe on a Table Tennis World Tour.You simply choose the country you want to play for and then start your journey to become the best Ping Pong player of them all.The Ping Pong rules are exactly the same as in real life:- Each player has two serves in a row- A match ends when one player has 11 points with at least 2 points in the lead- If the score is 11:10 the match continues until one player has achieved a 2 point lead- During this overtime the players alternate after every serveYou control your bat with by swiping your finger. The fast you swipe the harder you will hit the ping pong ball. Since this control scheme feels just natural, our Ping Pong app allows you to do everything you could do in real life. Surprise your opponent with a heavy power smash or throw him off guard with a vicious undercut. Learn to use the whole table and place your shots as precisely as possible. But be aware: the further you progress in Table Tennis World Tour, the more experienced and tough your opponents will become. You‚Äôre not the only one who has mastered the art of trick shots and spinning physics.Make your way through the ranks and lead your country to the top spot of the World Championship in this 3D table tennis app.Features:- 3D Ping Pong- Table Tennis World Tour- Realistic Ping Pong Physics- One of the best sports games- Choose your own country- Become the Ping Pong Master
descriptionHTML:
Ping Pong is one of the most practiced sports in the world. Not only in China, where it has been declared the national sport, but in all countries around the world people play Ping Pong for fun or on a competitive level.
With our brand new app you will have both, a lot of fun and a nice competition while trying to beat all the other countries from around the globe on a Table Tennis World Tour.

You simply choose the country you want to play for and then start your journey to become the best Ping Pong player of them all.

The Ping Pong rules are exactly the same as in real life:
- Each player has two serves in a row
- A match ends when one player has 11 points with at least 2 points in the lead
- If the score is 11:10 the match continues until one player has achieved a 2 point lead
- During this overtime the players alternate after every serve

You control your bat with by swiping your finger. The fast you swipe the harder you will hit the ping pong ball. Since this control scheme feels just natural, our Ping Pong app allows you to do everything you could do in real life. Surprise your opponent with a heavy power smash or throw him off guard with a vicious undercut. Learn to use the whole table and place your shots as precisely as possible.

But be aware: the further you progress in Table Tennis World Tour, the more experienced and tough your opponents will become. You’re not the only one who has mastered the art of trick shots and spinning physics.

Make your way through the ranks and lead your country to the top spot of the World Championship in this 3D table tennis app.

Features:
- 3D Ping Pong
- Table Tennis World Tour
- Realistic Ping Pong Physics
- One of the best sports games
- Choose your own country
- Become the Ping Pong Master
summary: Win the World Championship in this 3D Ping Pong Game with realistic physics.
title: Table Tennis World Tour - The 3D Ping Pong Game

description: Our lovely girl is getting married! She has dreamed about her wedding day since she was a little girl and now the moment has finally come. Enter one of the most elegant wedding games and help the bride and bridesmaids prepare for this special event.Getting ready for a wedding is not easy, it requires some effort and fashion sense. Our wedding game for girls has 4 levels, discover all the things you can do! The bride is going to be the center of attention, you should start with her! Enter the makeup salon and try on lovely shades of lipstick, eyeshadow, eyeliner and mascara. Create a delicate makeup look for the bride to be! After that, visit the hair salon and make sure she gets the perfect hairstyle.The most important part of a bride look is the dress. Enter the wedding dress up level and choose carefully. The dressing room is filled with all types of amazing wedding gowns and you can try all of them before you decide which one looks best on the sweet girl. Whatever you like, you will find it at the wedding fashion salon. Don't forget to pick a nice flower bouquet and a bride veil.The bridesmaids will also need a fashion adviser, don't forget to play dress up with them too. descriptionHTML:
Our lovely girl is getting married! She has dreamed about her wedding day since she was a little girl and now the moment has finally come. Enter one of the most elegant wedding games and help the bride and bridesmaids prepare for this special event.

Getting ready for a wedding is not easy, it requires some effort and fashion sense. Our wedding game for girls has 4 levels, discover all the things you can do! The bride is going to be the center of attention, you should start with her! Enter the makeup salon and try on lovely shades of lipstick, eyeshadow, eyeliner and mascara. Create a delicate makeup look for the bride to be! After that, visit the hair salon and make sure she gets the perfect hairstyle.

The most important part of a bride look is the dress. Enter the wedding dress up level and choose carefully. The dressing room is filled with all types of amazing wedding gowns and you can try all of them before you decide which one looks best on the sweet girl. Whatever you like, you will find it at the wedding fashion salon. Don't forget to pick a nice flower bouquet and a bride veil.

The bridesmaids will also need a fashion adviser, don't forget to play dress up with them too. You can pick matching outfits or completely different clothes for each girl. Even though the bride is the most important person at the wedding, the bridesmaids will also need to shine. Do your best as a wedding stylist!

Classy Wedding Salon game features:
💐 a gorgeous bride and 3 bridesmaids
💐 makeup, hair and dress up game levels
💐 wedding themed makeup, hairstyles and clothing items (dresses, blouses, skirts and lots of accessories)
💐 girly graphics and intuitive gameplay
💐 free to play wedding game
💐 fun and safe for little girls
💐 no wifi game

The wedding will start soon and these lovely girls need you! Join them right away in one of the most amazing wedding games. Do the bride's makeup, style her hair and find the perfect wedding dress. Then, explore different fashion options with the 3 bridesmaids. You will never get bored of this game for girls, give it a chance and let the fun begin!
recentChanges: No more bugs and the game is faster than ever. Have fun playing and don't forget to send us your feedback!
summary: Make the bride and her bridesmaids look perfect on the special wedding day!
title: Classy Wedding Salon

descriptionHTML:
Tend to your very own garden and unravel an exciting story in Family Yards: Memories Album - a casual match-3 game about family, making friends and exploding fruit bowls.

Help Alice and her family fix their garden, find the missing family pictures and restore their dream house. Solve challenging and fun match three puzzles to reveal more parts of your family garden, and then decorate them as you like! Collect hidden photos to complete the family album, meet and work together with fun-loving in-game characters, and unlock new boosters and quests.

What are you waiting for? Go on a gardening adventure and restore your beautiful family yard!

Game Features
✿ Hundreds of addictive match-3 levels: swap, match and crush all the fruit you want!
✿ Decorate the family garden to restore it to its original beauty!
✿ Explore different areas of the yards, each with its own unique look!
✿ Solve daily challenges to unlock new outfits for Alice!
✿ Follow the story of Alice and her Grandparents and uncover the family secrets!
✿ Meet fun characters that will help you through the story!
✿ Invite your Facebook friends over to play in your yard!
✿ We also have a cute kitten to brighten your day!

NOTE: Family Yards: Memories Album is completely free to play, but some in-game items can be purchased for real money. You can switch off the in-game purchase option in device settings. You need an Internet connection to play this game.

recentChanges: - More bonuses - more fun! Now every unused step gives 10 points! The Rainbow that explodes in the end of the level now gives 90 points!

- Fixes of progress issues and optimization were done.
That's not all! Stay tuned and get ready for the new Sprint Challenge and exciting Oscar's adventure coming in March!
summary: Solve Fun, Challenging Match 3 Levels and Build Your Dream Garden!
title: Family Yards: Memories Album

descriptionHTML:
Mit dem öamtc zum "Fahrrad-Champion"

Zeige dein Wissen um die Regeln im Straßenverkehr und küre dich zum "Fahrrad-Champion"! Mit dieser App wirst du im Handumdrehen zum Verkehrsregel-Profi. In drei verschiedenen Spielmodi kannst du dich der Herausforderung stellen und vom "Dreirad-Fahrer" zum "Fahrrad-Champion" aufsteigen.

Um vom „Dreirad-Fahrer“ zum „Fahrrad-Champion“ aufzusteigen musst du insgesamt 9 Levels bezwingen und mit deinem Wissen 4 Erfahrungsstufen absolvieren:

Es werden Fragen zu den Themen Verkehrszeichen, Verhalten im Straßenverkehr sowie Verhalten und Vorrangregeln auf Kreuzungen gestellt. Bei machen Fragen kannst du einfach mit „Ja“ oder „Nein“ antworten. Es erwarten dich aber auch Fragen, bei denen du aus mehreren Antwortmöglichkeiten wählen musst, wobei bei einer Frage auch mehrere Antworten richtig sein können. In diesem Fall ist die Frage nur dann korrekt beantwortet, wenn alle richtigen Antwortmöglichkeiten markiert wurden.

Die Spielmodi:

Spielmodus „Standard“ - pro Spiel werden dir 10 Fragen gestellt. Es gibt kein Zeitlimit zur Beantwortung.
Spielmodus „Auf Zeit“ - pro Spiel werden dir 10 Fragen gestellt. Pro Frage hast du 15 Sekunden Zeit um die richtige Antwort zu geben.
Spielmodus „Master Challenge“ - Du willst die ultimative Herausforderung? Dann ist dieser Modus das Richtige für dich. Alle Fragen des aktuellen Fragenkataloges werden auf einmal gestellt. Die Reihenfolge der Fragen ist zufällig. Du kannst diesen Modus mit oder ohne Zeitlimit spielen, je nachdem welchen Modus du zuletzt gewählt hattest.

In allen Spielmodi kannst du auch getrost eine Pause einlegen. Dein jeweiliger Fortschritt wird in der App gespeichert und du kannst später an der gleichen Stelle fortfahren. Auch bereits beantwortete Fragen von abgebrochenen Spielrunden werden zu deinem Gesamtergebnis addiert.

Training macht den Meister!
Es ist noch kein Champion vom Himmel gefallen. Auf deinem Weg zum "Fahrrad-Champion" wird es einige Fragen geben, die du falsch beantwortet hast. Diese wandern automatisch in den Trainingsmodus und bleiben dort so lange, bis sie von dir richtig beantwortet wurden. Sobald du im Trainingsmodus eine Frage richtig beantwortet hast, verschwindet die Frage wieder aus diesem Modus. Fragen die im Trainingsmodus beantwortet werden, zählen allerdings nicht als beantwortete Fragen für deinen Gesamtfortschritt!


*********

Rechtliche Hinweise: Für die technische Verfügbarkeit, inhaltliche Richtigkeit und Zuverlässigkeit der Applikation wird keinerlei Zusicherung oder Garantie abgegeben. Die Applikation kann jederzeit, auch ohne vorherige Benachrichtigung der Benutzer geändert oder eingestellt werden. Der ÖAMTC übernimmt keinerlei Haftung für jegliche Schäden, welcher Art auch immer, die aus der Benutzung der Applikation entstehen.
summary: Show your knowledge of the rules of the road and will "Bike Champion"!
title: Fahrrad-Champion

descriptionHTML:
Join millions of kids in new hair styling and jungle fashion makeover adventures! Meet their beloved beauty salon clients at the beach and play new summer holiday makeover games for girls and boys. Wash, dress up, style and design fun and crazy looks!

Kids' favorite jungle animals and new games make Jungle Animal Hair Salon 2 the best sequel of the most popular TutoTOONS game for kids. Free your imagination and have fun!

Travel to the tropics and say hello to leopard Amy, elephant Sarah, zebra Gizelle, monkey Maya and toucan Rosa. Every jungle animal has its own style and favorite spa but they all need summer fashion tips. Leopard Amy wants to look cute with new makeup and fancy clothes. Elephant Sarah loves a spa bath and wants to dress up for holidays at the beach. Zebra Gizelle can’t wait to try new hairstyles and cool outfits. Monkey Maya plays in the jungle, always gets messy and hungry. Toucan Rosa misses her Rio Carnival look and needs you help look wonderful. Take your hair styling tools to the sandy beach and get started!

Play tropical summer makeover games for girls and boys:
· Pick the animal you want to style first: leopard, elephant, zebra, monkey or toucan!
· NEW! Try out different hairstyles and outfits and create a magical look for zebra Gizelle!
· NEW! Clean up hungry monkey Maya, feed her, dress up and do an amazing hairstyle!
· NEW! Take care of elephant Sarah's skin, do nails, style hair and choose the cutest clothes!
· NEW! Get ready for the scariest night and carve a pumpkin for Halloween party!
· Wash and braid leopard Amy's hair, do makeup and dress up in style!
· Mix and match carnival accessories and create a Brazilian look for Rosa, queen of the jungle!
· Play music with leopard Amy’s ukulele and toucan Rosa’s maracas!
· Join sloth Linda at the beach hut and make exotic fruit slushies for everyone!
· Play Jungle Animal Hair Salon 2 every day and collect bonus coins!
· Level up and unlock new exciting mini games with your favorite jungle animals!
· Watch videos for kids and toddlers, earn coins and unlock new dress up items!
· Play, learn about jungle life and tropical animals and have tons of fun!



- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

ABOUT TutoTOONS Games for Kids
Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games for girls and boys cherish the childhood and help children learn the basic life skills through games they love.
Dress up games can develop kids' creativity and art skills, cleanup games build good every day habits, cooking games show children how to help parents at home, pet games teach girls and boys to share and care. These are just a few examples how TutoTOONS games for kids let explore the world around them and develop on screen time.

PRIVACY
This app is free to play but there are certain in-game items that may be purchased for real money. By downloading this app you agree to TutoTOONS Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

comments: I hope you take the time to read.   This game is amazing, and it just keeps getting better. I do wish you would change the video knives to apples or video. Now I have nothing to spend apples on.  But here is what i really wanted to say i really like this company and the games you put out to your users. I'm newly paralyzed and I been well adapting to my new life and because my hands dont work like they used to these games kept my mind busy and has helped me. I own alot of your games and have spent alot trying to help. I wish I had more to unlock things in time. But Thank you very much.

The game sucks it's alwful. It's gliching non stop for your bad. There are ADS everywhere! Ketchapp you getting worse and worse. There are ads of stupid games everywhere. What a game maker will pay to another game to show them in ADS! That makes the game in the ad even worse. Please ketchapp I was a big fan of you but you made your games so STUPIT. PLEASE FIX YOUR GAMES!

This skill-based time waster would be better without the hyper-agressive advertising. First you have the constant banner ad at the bottom of the screen. That's forgiveable because it's out of the way and doesn't really affect gameplay. It's the fail-state adevertisements that constantly interrupt retrys that will irritate even the most casual of gamers.   The only people writing good reviews for this game are bot accounts.

I like the game, BUT it is glitchy. Most of the time when I hit "continue" to watch an ad for longer gameplay it freezes, so I have to close the app and start over. When I open the app and start playing the first round, an ad pops up and I inevitably click on it because I'm in the middle of playing the round. Please fix these issues, and I'll try to remember to rate this higher once they're fixed.

Ads interrupt gameplay and are extremely aggravating. The video that you have to watch to continue your gameplay never works. The game crashes when xp increases. I personally dislike this game, and it would be better if these issues were resolved. Thank you for taking time out of your day to read this review.

Deleted all my data with no reason. Had a bunch of Legendaries and Rares that have now been deleted. I put a lot of time into this game, and even bought the ad-free package. If you don't want a load of wasted time, don't download this app.  Edit- Updated the app and levelled up a bit. The game crashes every time I get a free revive. Still a massive waste of time.

description: Baby Ava Daily Activities is a game about learning activities of our day to day life. This game is a collection of many activities with fun tasks, which are necessary in our regular life. In this Daily Routine Activities game, there is cute and little baby Ava who requires your help to complete her daily routine activities. There are so many routine activities which are not easy for Baby Ava like proper washing of hands and face, brushing teeth, taking a bath, cutting nails, doing hair, dressing up, eating healthy food, maintaining cleanliness, maintaining sleep time and many more. This famiy educational game covers all the activities we do in our routine life. So become a babysitter in this baby care game and help baby Ava to complete these activities in a proper way and don't make her cry. This game helps Family to learn quickly daily activities with lots of fun.Key Features of Baby Ava Daily Activities game:- Quick learning game for Family- Manners of routine activities- Over 40+ daily activities- Maintaining cleanliness- Watch Ava with different moods and expressions- Read and enjoy Bedtime stories- Know How to eat food properly- Family learn everything with fun in this daycare game- Entertainment with AvaHelp your Family by giving them such a wonderful learning game that teach them, how to do their daily life activities and baby Ava will entertain them for hours.

comments: I'm loving these updates really bring more life to the game. The new car is really fun because it can flip over really easy. Please don't change that. A few suggestions: When you go to winter wonderland you can't go back. Would be cool if car panels would become detached like the hood or the trunk. Adding a police cruiser would be cool too. I like the breakable rear lights on some of the cars. Maybe add deflatable tires? Very good game all in all

Need a 67 Shelby mustang gt 500 fastback "Eleanor". Also needs a hand brake for sharp turns and drifting and maybe an inside view with steering wheel and stick shift. Very fun and addicting game. Great job here. Multi-player would be cool too.

This game is awsome!  Controls and graphics can be a little laggy,  but the large amount of tracks and cars to unlock and play around with makes up for it. My favorite car is the Duke Wagon Classic, nitro-charged, with a v-8 dropped into it.  Will kick butt in any race or derby! My only suggestion would be on the physics of the cars... Instead of having the bodies simply crush and get smaller/deformed, it would be cool to see body panels and  small pieces like lights and mirrors fall right off. Just a thought. Also it would be cool to have more big station wagon type cars.

This game is really fun and additive I play it EVERYDAY. This game is by far the best demolition derby game I,ve  played. For my free car I would like a lykan hypersport please!!! ;-) If you do not know what it is please look it up and please try to make it they are really cool, fast, and exotic cars. If not I would like tank. Thank you for reading.

Cool game! Good grapich! Nice control! Fun Game!  Well, this game need more jumpy track and smaller road for racing. Imagine if you race and the car jumping through the track. Idk why straight maps its not very fun to play. I want downhill track with ultra high jump im sure lot of epic moment will happened there   And jumpy map for derby mode with more obstacles and every maps must have its unique​ thing like falling rock or bouncy bomb im sure this will give more fun.  Car? I want the car have accessories like extra headlight, bumper or weapon? 20¬∞ arc ram in front of car will give more fun and and rear mirror and driver POV camera  Well, i want ice cream truck, the officially derby monster truck, hot wheels car and F1? :/

I had loved this game until it stopped saving my car purchases. Like my last  one the pick up that looks exactly like a 80s chevy with the cap off and roll cage. I put 7.0 motor in it with NOS tires and paint. Went in this morning it was gone. Please fix.Norton also says you're monitoring my location how obtrusive you dushbags.

comments: I absolutely love this game...And I saw a small easer egg in it as well!!! I am a big Stranger Things fan and when I caught the green frog called HOPPER(sounds familiar?)and I looked at his bio I saw that it said that his fav toy is a FLASHLIGHT, which Hopper uses in the Upside Down, his fav food if coffee, and Hopper is well known for his 'Mornings are for coffee and contemplation' quote and it said that the frog's life is getting STRANGER and STRANGER! Like come on it has to be a Stranger Things easer egg....like if u agree. Other than that i really like the game it is so cute and the bunnies are adorable!üòç

I really like this app and I have fun playing it :D I love the concept of collecting pets while running and it motivates me to collect all the pets I can possibly get! However I have a problem. When I first open the app it's all fine and it loads and I can play. However the moment I close the app then open it again it won't load. It'll just stay on that screen with the tiger and panda. I tried undownloading and downloading again and it worked when I first opened the app but when I close out it won't load the 2nd time  I opened the app.

Hello! Can you please get back to me with my question? I have been playing this game for only two days and already have lots of pets tagged ‚ù§. Let me say, this game is so cute, fun, and addicting! Right now I have been trying to figure out what my friends time zone is so I changed the time and time zone,  and I thought all was well. Unfortunately, when I got back onto Dash Tag I still had my unlocked pet, Smoky, as my character but it gave me the tutorial pop up. When I closed the game's tab and reopened the game, it had Sparky and I had lost all my coins, gems, and pets. Please help, it would be appreciated! Thanks!

The game is nice (for graphics and stuffs) but, it has many lags and bugs when i wanted to move my pet when running... and also.. limited ads (trying to play game for free first) so i couldn't even reach 10000 score :(  yeah this game is actually like subway surfers but its pets... it has rare pets... and idk whats the apple or milk equipment does.... i dont see any effects when i equip 1 tho-  you guys can make this game better tho. i kinda wait till the games better and I'll reinstall again

Hello Wildworks! Please read this! I have recently downloaded the game on my Chromebook, which is the only android I own that has the Play Store on it. It would be easier for me if I could get it on my Kindle Fire. Please make Dash Tap avalible to the amazon app store as soon as possible! I would rate 5 stars on there, otherwise my review is a 4 stars. In otherwords, the game is great! It isn't as challenging for me since I already play many games that are like this. Since it's more challenging on the chromebook, I'm still stuck on the first pet you have at the start.  As I said before, please make the app avalible for the amazon app store soon! Thank you!

Although the game is fun, cute, and addicting, there are some things that don't really function. For instance, I'll watch an ad (particularly an ad for deal dash) and it won't continue my round. It works for all ads except deal dash. It also has some obstacles in the Coral canyons setting that are difficult to pass. Ideally, most people playing the game are young at age and I personally feel like the game is a little bit too hard. Overall, it's a good game, but I think some adjustments are necessary.

descriptionHTML:
PETS ON THE LOOSE!

Run, dash, slide, and jump your way through forest treetops, redrock canyons, and other challenging terrain! Collect dozens of pets, complete daily missions, and unlock tons of fun goodies. Welcome to Dash Tag, the best endless runner game! Choose your favorite pet and get ready to run with your friends and evade capture by Misha!

• Collect dozens of rare and unique pets
• Play as every pet you collect
• Unlock power-ups, outfits, and stats
• Speed through levels in pet cars
• Endless runner with new missions every day
• Free to play
• Easy to learn

Use the coins and emeralds you collect to purchase loads of upgrades like costumes, power-ups, and even pet cars! The farther you run, the more you collect. And the more you collect, the more fun you'll have!

So whether you prefer to scamper, scurry, or scuttle, join the fun of this amazing pet adventure today!

summary: Become your favorite pet and see how far you can go in this adventurous runner.
title: Dash Tag - Fun Endless Runner!

comments: My first thought when I opened uo the game and saw that it was made in unity I was expecting a broken half assed game. However, this game is crafted very well. Amazing effects for the sound pitches of the music played and the screen shake makes you really feel the music. For the car selection its pretty good. But personally, I would reccomend only including cars from the 70s to 90s. Since i'm guessing you're going with a vaporwave vibe, a modern car such as the jaguar isn't really the best thing in my opinion. Cars I would reccomend would be the Lamborghini Diablo, Ferrari Testarossa, Ferrari 348TB, any classic Porsche 911, ofcourse the delorean and any other 80s retro car.

Well it's not a game it's MP3 player with some visual effects. Zero gameplay, you can just start level put your phone away and your bird will finish level for you. No matter if u hit a red pole or not. You can't die here anyway. there's no challenge, there's no game at all. I like visuals though

I overally love the game itself, it just lack a bit if features. For example: -Song search -Difficulty settings -Speed settings Add these, and you have an awesome rhythm based racing game on mobile. The Devs did a great job.
Surprisingly awesome! Got it after seeing Neon Drive gameplay. Only problem is that when u hit a column, the screen flashes too long. I end up hitting more and more because I can't see.

Great "Retro" Game. Was so skeptical at first due to the lack of 'downloads' in this game but was pretty surprised how retro and interactive this was. A few Tracks and Options is needed but a better UI, new name, and a new icon is a must. The current UI is very straightforward and feels the need to be changed. Hope you consider my request. Cheers!  Edit: Where can I contact you? Any G+ Community?
Overall, I'm addicted. I love how the visuals match the beat. I would like to see some more maps and a few more vehicles, but overall, oven never seen a good game like this ever!

descriptionHTML:
Play now with Daryl, Rick, Michonne and many other characters of AMC’s The Walking Dead! Collect Heroes through radio calls and unlock special abilities and valuable leader traits. Complete Episode 1 for free Daryl tokens and unlock the first Hero of your team!

The Walking Dead: No Man’s Land is a thrilling, action-packed RPG where tactical choices make the difference between life and death. Only the strongest will survive so choose your team wisely: bring Michonne and dominate in close-quarter combat or send Rick to dispatch enemies from afar. Or perhaps you’ll choose to snipe from a distance with Daryl’s crossbow, or mow the herd down with Abraham’s assault rifle.

• FIGHT through hordes of deadly enemies in tactical turn-based combat
• COLLECT and upgrade your favorite characters from AMC’s The Walking Dead
• CHOOSE the right team and the equipment for each mission
• HUNT walkers in Terminus, The Prison and other familiar locations from AMC’s The Walking Dead
• JOIN other players in deadly weekly challenges and PVP combat for exclusive rewards

“Throw in some pretty swish graphics, lovely animations and blood splatters, and you have one of the most carefully fleshed out zombie games we've seen on mobile. It looks lovely, and plays great too.” - Pocketgamer

“Each aspect of survival on AMC's The Walking Dead has been parallel to the series' official mobile game, subtitled No Man's Land.” - Mashable

“Imagine your favorite mobile base-building strategy game, mix in a dash of XCOM, and then paint on a fresh coat of AMC’s The Walking Dead. That’s No Man’s Land in a nutshell.” - Gamezebo

For more, please visit:

http://www.facebook.com/thewalkingdeadnomansland
http://twitter.com/twdnomansland
http://www.thewalkingdeadnomansland.com
http://www.youtube.com/nxtgms

For player support, please visit:
nextgames.helpshift.com

descriptionHTML:
■ Survival mode unlocked!
■ New items, stages and zombies!
■ Adjusted difficulty level.

■ Synopsis
Once an ordinary man, Peter is left to survive in midst of a zombie apocalypse. As he fights against them, his strength and skill grows.
Your job is simple - survive.

■ Features
Kill zombies and collect Gold to upgrade teammates and various installations - to kill more zombies!

Simply tap to fire your gun.
Your tapping speed determines the firing speed.

Hire teammates to increase chance of survival in this world of despair.

Experience this simple, yet strategic game!

■ Info
You can use auto-fire when you reach a certain level.
There are various skills that can save you from critical situation.
Every teammate has different weapons, with unique attributes.
Kill zombies for Gold. Use the Gold to upgrade teammates and maintain the camp.
Offensive or deffensive? It all depends on your choice.
As days pass zombies become stronger, and they will become even more powerful during night time.
Collect various inventory items for additional strength.
It's a good idea to check the type of item each Boss yields.
Mine is a very powerful weapon with devastating damage.
When barricade is breached, zombies can attack your teammates.
Nuke will restart the game, but you'll keep inventory items.
When you have an inventory item, obtain another identical item to upgrade it.
If the game is too hard, try again from the start with your inventory items by using Nuke.
There's a massive Last Boss waiting for you.

■ This game saves player data in device. Deleting the app will terminate all save data.

17, Bukbusunhwando-ro, Nam-gu, Ulsan, Republic of Korea

summary: Survive chaotic zombie apocalypse!Tap and kill endless wave of zombie horde!
title: 100 DAYS - Zombie Survival

descriptionHTML:
Subway School Children Simulator
Metro Train Train School Children Simulator - build a career as a subway mechanic.
Do you like to manage different techniques? Then this simulator is for you!
Carry children and their parents from home to school and back.
Remember - you are responsible for the lives of the passengers you carry!
Smoothly accelerate and slow down, without disturbing the comfort of transported people.
Stopping at the stations, make sure that all people enter, no one should be late for lessons!
Get experience points and change to more modern electric trains!
Open all the presented locomotives for a more successful passage of the game.
Metro is one of the fastest modes of transport, capable of transporting passengers to destinations without any traffic jams in a very short time!
On the straight sections of the route, accelerate to the maximum speed.
Come to the cabin of the train!

- The mechanics of the electric train control is as close as possible to the real one.

- View from the cockpit will allow you to immerse yourself in the gameplay.
- Qualitative soundtrack will create the atmosphere of the metro.

Share your comments and leave ratings!
Start playing now!

description: Come and be a part of the gaming revolution that SALT is. Play something new every day. If you love challenges, adventures, and games, you are at the best place you could possibly be. We promise to take you on an unending adventure with new challenges, new stories, and a brand new game every day.In life, you encounter a lot of problems. Problems with studies, problems with exams, problems with relationships, problems of finance and what not. And just when you think you have a solution to a particular problem, Life throws at you a brand new problem.Well, solving problems of life isn't much fun but cracking games can be. And you know it. Especially when it comes to challenging your friends and beating them at it. Ever imagined yourself living a different life every single day. One day you are a politician, on another day you are a doctor, on some other day you are a businessman, one day you are an engineer. Okay! Let's leave the engineers out of it. Sorry once again! Wouldn't the surprise element in the aforementioned cases be amazing?Wouldn't you just look forward to waking up from your bed every single day to try to find out what awaits you today?Wouldn't the excitement levels be extremely high if there was something like this?Well, there is!SALT brings to you a wide variety of games. In fact, the game changes every day. Yes! Every single day. On Monday, you are figuring out a way to help Mr. Stick escape the murderous Pie Man. On Tuesday, you are defending your planet against the invasion of aliens. On Wednesday, you have to navigate through laser walls to save your life. You might need to kill everything that comes in the way. #JustSayingOn Thursday, you need to help the squares reclaim their rights in the autocratic world of rectangles. On Friday, you suddenly find yourself in a pond of fishes and as some old Mr Darwin said, ‚ÄúOnly the fittest survive‚Äù, you need to feed yourself and avoid everything else in the fish-eat-fish world.On Saturday, you have to figure out a strategy to build bridges between squares and rectangles to make this world a peaceful place.On Sunday. Yes, we know it's a Sunday! You are required to just chill and drive your way through small obstacles to your destinations.And the best part is that the surprise element is the only constant that you will get here. No Sunday will ever be the same again. And no Monday will be as dull(?) as it was the previous week. Join us on this journey of SALT where just like life we offer you a brand new set of challenges and maybe wars every single day, albeit in a much simpler way. Our games are easy to learn but hard to master. On top of that, you will have only 24 hours to stake a claim for becoming the 'Best'. Challenge your buddies, set new high scores and brag about it. (That's what high scores are for!) Make your games more interesting, accept new challenges and most importantly as our beloved MS Dhoni puts it -- "Enjoy The Game"!And as a sie man once put it."The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it and join the dance."Come join the SALT adventure.
descriptionHTML:
Come and be a part of the gaming revolution that SALT is. Play something new every day.
If you love challenges, adventures, and games, you are at the best place you could possibly be. We promise to take you on an unending adventure with new challenges, new stories, and a brand new game every day.

In life, you encounter a lot of problems. Problems with studies, problems with exams, problems with relationships, problems of finance and what not. And just when you think you have a solution to a particular problem, Life throws at you a brand new problem.
Well, solving problems of life isn't much fun but cracking games can be. And you know it. Especially when it comes to challenging your friends and beating them at it.

Ever imagined yourself living a different life every single day. One day you are a politician, on another day you are a doctor, on some other day you are a businessman, one day you are an engineer. Okay! Let's leave the engineers out of it. Sorry once again!

Wouldn't the surprise element in the aforementioned cases be amazing?
Wouldn't you just look forward to waking up from your bed every single day to try to find out what awaits you today?
Wouldn't the excitement levels be extremely high if there was something like this?
Well, there is!

SALT brings to you a wide variety of games. In fact, the game changes every day. Yes! Every single day.

On Monday, you are figuring out a way to help Mr. Stick escape the murderous Pie Man.
On Tuesday, you are defending your planet against the invasion of aliens.
On Wednesday, you have to navigate through laser walls to save your life. You might need to kill everything that comes in the way. #JustSaying
On Thursday, you need to help the squares reclaim their rights in the autocratic world of rectangles.
On Friday, you suddenly find yourself in a pond of fishes and as some old Mr Darwin said, “Only the fittest survive”, you need to feed yourself and avoid everything else in the fish-eat-fish world.
On Saturday, you have to figure out a strategy to build bridges between squares and rectangles to make this world a peaceful place.
On Sunday. Yes, we know it's a Sunday! You are required to just chill and drive your way through small obstacles to your destinations.
And the best part is that the surprise element is the only constant that you will get here. No Sunday will ever be the same again. And no Monday will be as dull(?) as it was the previous week.

Join us on this journey of SALT where just like life we offer you a brand new set of challenges and maybe wars every single day, albeit in a much simpler way.
Our games are easy to learn but hard to master. On top of that, you will have only 24 hours to stake a claim for becoming the 'Best'. Challenge your buddies, set new high scores and brag about it. (That's what high scores are for!)

Make your games more interesting, accept new challenges and most importantly as our beloved MS Dhoni puts it -- "Enjoy The Game"!

And as a sie man once put it.
"The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it and join the dance."
Come join the SALT adventure.
recentChanges: The app that‚Äôll spring a new surprise for you everyday in the form of engaging and challengingly exciting new games.
summary: Take a plunge into a new beginning every 24 hours & play something new every day
title: SALT - Play Something New Everyday

description: Red Woods is a tangled first person mystery where the game play jumps between two different characters. On one side, Claire Mills ‚Äì a young college student who went through a car crash only to wake up in a strange, abandoned fallout shelter. On the other, her father Harry, trying to figure out where Claire has disappeared to.True psychological horror is grounded in reality. To feel afraid, you have to believe you're really there and Red Woods feels more real than anything you've ever experienced. Simple interactions like flicking a light switch, picking up an item or opening a door become tense experiences because you don't know what's going to happen when you turn the handle. Every moment is ripe for horror. There's minimal HUD and the camera never pulls back from the first person perspective - there's nothing between you and whatever happens next.ONE OF THE BEST HORROR GAMES OF THE YEAR - PhoneArenaFEATURES:HIGHLY DETAILED AAA GRAPHICSRed Woods features some of the most natural looking visuals ever seen on a mobile game.DRAMATIC CLIFF-HANGERSMoments to leave you eagerly anticipating the next twist in the gripping horror story.       REALISTIC LOCATIONSRed Woods features a variety of stunningly realistic environments which will challenge your puzzle solving abilities.INTUITIVE TOUCH CONTROLSExplore and interact with your surroundings with ease through first person perspective.MULTIPLE GAME ENDINGSIn-game actions taken by the player determine the faith of the characters.NOTICE:Red Woods features high quality visuals. Performance is not optimized on devices with less than 1GB RAM.RECOMMENDED SPECS:GPU: Adreno 300 series, Mali-T600 series,PowerVR SGX544, or Tegra 4CPU: Quad core 1.5GHzMemory: 2GBRed Woods is optimized for tablets.Visit www.halesoft.ie/red-woods.html for a full walk-through.
descriptionHTML:
Red Woods is a tangled first person mystery where the game play jumps between two different characters. On one side, Claire Mills – a young college student who went through a car crash only to wake up in a strange, abandoned fallout shelter. On the other, her father Harry, trying to figure out where Claire has disappeared to.

True psychological horror is grounded in reality. To feel afraid, you have to believe you're really there and Red Woods feels more real than anything you've ever experienced. Simple interactions like flicking a light switch, picking up an item or opening a door become tense experiences because you don't know what's going to happen when you turn the handle. Every moment is ripe for horror. There's minimal HUD and the camera never pulls back from the first person perspective - there's nothing between you and whatever happens next.


ONE OF THE BEST HORROR GAMES OF THE YEAR - PhoneArena


FEATURES:

HIGHLY DETAILED AAA GRAPHICS
Red Woods features some of the most natural looking visuals ever seen on a mobile game.

DRAMATIC CLIFF-HANGERS
Moments to leave you eagerly anticipating the next twist in the gripping horror story.

REALISTIC LOCATIONS
Red Woods features a variety of stunningly realistic environments which will challenge your puzzle solving abilities.

INTUITIVE TOUCH CONTROLS
Explore and interact with your surroundings with ease through first person perspective.

MULTIPLE GAME ENDINGS
In-game actions taken by the player determine the faith of the characters.

NOTICE:
Red Woods features high quality visuals. Performance is not optimized on devices with less than 1GB RAM.

RECOMMENDED SPECS:
GPU: Adreno 300 series, Mali-T600 series,
PowerVR SGX544, or Tegra 4
CPU: Quad core 1.5GHz
Memory: 2GB

Red Woods is optimized for tablets.

Visit www.halesoft.ie/red-woods.html for a full walk-through.
summary: Survive the Game, Solve the Puzzles, Uncover the Mystery, Escape the Horror.
title: Red Woods: Awakening

descriptionHTML:
Zak Storm Super Pirate World is a super magical adventure and fantasy side-scrolling platformer

Enjoy the runner mood in magic world with your favorite anime heroes! Today is time of the fastest hero of Mamor world.
Jump, dash, running, hurry, sprint as you can! Let’s start fun run with hero right now.
Try to get to the end of the road, dash over obstacles and the same time collecting and get coins.
Help BOY to jump like ninja from one building to another and collect coins. The more coins you collect.Be attentive and not to fall, otherwise you will lose your life!
The Amazing Adventures of BOY begin. Help Zak Storm Super Pirate to escape from the curse of the new! The evil witch cast a spell and now the Royal Academy of the young BOY needs to get through the ruins of an old castle, fleeing from a huge curse! Only you can help her!

Download free fun and exciting adventures game for kids. Start playing running gameOYs and you will be fan of it!

Exciting features:
+ 4 different addictive worlds
+ 80 wonderful, well-designed, exciting and challening levels with slowly increasing game difficulty
+ 8 awesome boss fights (angry scorpion, dangerous spider, crocodile boss) in 8 different dark castles
+ great number of power ups, bonus rounds, secret blocks and bonus items
+ over 20 various, great animated enemies such as crocs, cats, frogs, spiders, monsters, dragons, snails and many more
+ great mix between 2D and 3D graphics in very high resolution
+ retro arcade music and old school sound effects
+ perfect, intuitve super game control through retro console games control pad
+ special skills hidden in destroyable blocks and bricks
+ awesome gameplay reminding to retro classic dash games
+ water and sea worlds - jumping, running, fighting AND swimming!
+ try to unlock all achievements and to be number one of leaderboards!

How to play:
+ click right or left on your control pad for moving Mamor the frst super hero girl!
+ down-button is for ducking and also to get to some bonus levels (under tree stumps)
+ press B-button to make Super BOY jumping!
+ press A-button AND right or left for running; press A and B together for a higher and wider jump!

The game develops attention and reaction of the child!

A lot of troubles, enemies and traps are waiting for you in wonder world.Blue Ball  will have to jump and run over obstacles, fight against bees, snakes, snails and a lot of other monsters and dragons, climb up huge stairs and mountains, swim through dangerous seas and explore a lot of jungle, castle and wonder adventure worlds.Collect coins, find hidden blocks and levels and explore lot of challenging and addictive worlds and lands!This cool Jump`n`Run is a non-stop old school arcade adventure!+ 80 colorful levels and 4 different challenging worlds (wonder world, forest, egypt land and cave)+ 8 awesome boss fights (scorpion, spider, crocodile,...) in 4 different castles + lots of power ups, bonus levels, hidden blocks and bonus items+ over 20 different, beautiful animated enemies such as bees, frogs, spiders, snails,...+ great mix between 3D and 2D graphics - comes to a great "soft 2d style"+ retro arcade music and cool sound effects + perfect game control through control pad like on console games + achievements and leaderboardsHow to play:+ for moving the character click on right or left on the control pad!+ click down for ducking or on some tree stumps to come to a bonus level!+ press B-button to make Super jumping!+ press A-button AND right or left for running; press A and B together for a higher and wider jump!+ after eating an apple you become Silver and will be able to destroy bricks!+ after eating a golden flower you become Golden Frozen and will be able to shoot balls - press B-Button for shooting!+ swimming: press A-Button multiple times to swim higher ... release your finger from button to go down!Enjoy.
descriptionHTML:
Blue Ball 6 is being kidnapped by the evil croc and brought to the dark castle. the little troll to rescue her!

But be careful! A lot of troubles, enemies and traps are waiting for you in wonder world.

Blue Ball will have to jump and run over obstacles, fight against bees, snakes, snails and a lot of other monsters and dragons, climb up huge stairs and mountains, swim through dangerous seas and explore a lot of jungle, castle and wonder adventure worlds.

Collect coins, find hidden blocks and levels and explore lot of challenging and addictive worlds and lands!

This cool Jump`n`Run is a non-stop old school arcade adventure!

+ 80 colorful levels and 4 different challenging worlds (wonder world, forest, egypt land and cave)
+ 8 awesome boss fights (scorpion, spider, crocodile,...) in 4 different castles
+ lots of power ups, bonus levels, hidden blocks and bonus items
+ over 20 different, beautiful animated enemies such as bees, frogs, spiders, snails,...
+ great mix between 3D and 2D graphics - comes to a great "soft 2d style"
+ retro arcade music and cool sound effects
+ perfect game control through control pad like on console games
+ achievements and leaderboards

How to play:
+ for moving the character click on right or left on the control pad!
+ click down for ducking or on some tree stumps to come to a bonus level!
+ press B-button to make Super jumping!
+ press A-button AND right or left for running; press A and B together for a higher and wider jump!
+ after eating an apple you become Silver and will be able to destroy bricks!
+ after eating a golden flower you become Golden Frozen and will be able to shoot balls - press B-Button for shooting!
+ swimming: press A-Button multiple times to swim higher ... release your finger from button to go down!

Enjoy.
summary: Blue Ball 6 World
title: Blue Ball 6

descriptionHTML:
Mellisa is nine months pregnant and preparing to give birth. Her family is out of city and it is up to you to manage the whole pregnancy surgery process.


Mellisa is going to have a baby soon. She goes to the hospital. After a whole body examination, the doctor tells


Mellisa that she needs a caesarean surgery.


Become a doctor and prepare the surgery. Firstly give her the anaesthetic and then turn on the breathing machine. When the preparation is done, like a doctor finish the surgery.

The baby is born. But there are lots of work that need to be finished. Please complete the treatment for both the mommy and the baby.

The baby is so cute. Please take care of him. Thanks.


1) help Mellisa to eat, then take her to the hospital by road.
2) While going to the hospital, avoid any car accidents.
3) Drive the ambulance and take her to the hospital quickly.
4) Apply a treatment to get rid of stretch marks caused by pregnancy.
5) Make ultrasound scan to see in what state the babies are in.
6) Now head home and make them a warm bath.
7) Play with her child, help her to do so as well.
8) Make the baby go to sleep, so you can help Melissa dress.


A game for young children who want to become a doctor in the near future. Test your skills to the limit and show the world that you can become a doctor. With so many mommy’s to select from and so many prince and princesses to come in this world. You surely can be the best surgery doctor on playstore

comments: Loved the game, however as outlined by other users the coin system is bizzare. Packs 1-5 can be opened easily, however after that you simply cannot get enough coins to progress. Tried watching ads to collect coins but ran out of ads to watch (without even getting enough coins, had 50, needed 250 for the next pack, thats 125 ads! grr)

A fantastic game ruined by microtransactions. A fun mechanic and challenging puzzles, but you only get the first few packs for free. After that, you don't earn enough coins to open more packs, at which point you have to wait 6 hours for 10 coins, or watch an additional for a measly 2. I'd love to recommend this game but just can't in its current state.  EDIT: After waiting a couple of days and saving up coins, I unlocked one more pack. It's slow, but the game is quite compelling when you do get to play it. I would now recommend this game, just don't expect to play it too often.

I'm totally addicted to this game, but after the 10th pack or so u don't have enough coins to buy anything. I rushed through all the levels and never used hints or the double coin thing. And now I'm stuck, I can't do anything. The daily 6 "maps" are like 3 minutes of fun and cost more as you get in return. Maybe don't make the packs so expansive or give more coins for faster clearing. Idk I just want to play this game it's to much fun. Please fix it. I love this game ‚ù§Ô∏è

Simple and relaxing Sudoku-style puzzle, mostly trains attention as you look for opportunities to gradually eliminate unknown cells. Hints are awesome as they seem to know exactly where you're stuck, and teach new methods along the way.   Economy is odd, as you progress packs cost more so become unprofitable -- you can watch ads to gain a little more, but still not enough (plus, app detects WiFi at start and can't see it if switched on in game).  Still, a nice little puzzle with a lot of simple levels, until you hit the paywall.

If only for the game, I would've given it 5 stars. But the ridiculous system of gaining coins forces you to wait days before you can actually play a bit more. I don't understand what's the point of getting coins if you have to use them to get the next level, if you want us to buy the game then list it as a buy only product

This is a really neat puzzle game, but the monetization is terrible. Once the packs get more expensive, you have to wait a long time, watch a ton of ads, or pay for coins. I'd be willing to support the game, but buying all puzzles would cost more than 20 USD, which is not worth it.

description: Become a horse owner in our new animal simulator! Raise and groom an entire horse herd on your farm and see if it fits for survival in the wild. Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator if full of animals adventures and funny stuff to do with your horse herd!Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator features:>YOUR OWN HORSE HERD - create a unique horse, make a family and raise foals>REALISTIC ANIMAL CARE - wash and feed your horse and foal, to keep them happy>OPEN WORLD ADVENURES - explore big world, meet humans, wild animals and other horses >LOTS OF ACTIVITES - complete quests, take part in horse racing and do other stuffCustomize a horse!You can choose breed, color, gender and name for your horse, and try to take care of a horse you create! And after that complete quests and fight enemies to make your horse and herd stronger in the animal simulator. A horse herd life is fascinating, experience it in our animal simulator!Take care of a herd!Once your horse strong enough, you can star a herd and explore the world together - horse is a herding animal! Groom your foals, level up your horse herd to make a bigger herd in the animal simulator. And don‚Äôt forget to wash, feed and play with your horse!Explore open world!There‚Äôs a lot to do in the animals life simulator, so explore the world with your herd! Interesting quests, wild animals and picturesque locations are waiting - explore the world of the simulator with your horse herd and find them all!Try living with a horse herd in Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator - a captivating animals life simulator!
descriptionHTML:
Become a horse owner in our new animal simulator! Raise and groom an entire horse herd on your farm and see if it fits for survival in the wild. Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator if full of animals adventures and funny stuff to do with your horse herd!

Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator features:

>YOUR OWN HORSE HERD - create a unique horse, make a family and raise foals

>REALISTIC ANIMAL CARE - wash and feed your horse and foal, to keep them happy

>OPEN WORLD ADVENURES - explore big world, meet humans, wild animals and other horses

>LOTS OF ACTIVITES - complete quests, take part in horse racing and do other stuff

Customize a horse!
You can choose breed, color, gender and name for your horse, and try to take care of a horse you create! And after that complete quests and fight enemies to make your horse and herd stronger in the animal simulator. A horse herd life is fascinating, experience it in our animal simulator!

Take care of a herd!
Once your horse strong enough, you can star a herd and explore the world together - horse is a herding animal! Groom your foals, level up your horse herd to make a bigger herd in the animal simulator. And don’t forget to wash, feed and play with your horse!

Explore open world!
There’s a lot to do in the animals life simulator, so explore the world with your herd! Interesting quests, wild animals and picturesque locations are waiting - explore the world of the simulator with your horse herd and find them all!

Try living with a horse herd in Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator - a captivating animals life simulator!
summary: Welcome to a farm where you can play with your own herd in a Horse Stable!
title: Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator
